analyzed: rdus pa de ma'i khong na gnas shing rim gyis skyes pa dang / zla ba bcu la las yongs su dag pa ni /

analyzed: khrag rdus pa de la yang dbang po drug phra ba'i tshul du med pa ma yin te /

analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /

translated: They are the emanations of the buddhas that pervade the realm of space and extend to the end of the realm of phenomena; the emanations of the bodhisattvas that are without distinction and reach the ultimate, which are the highest, supreme, and perfect;

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin nyid la zhugs shing /
translated: the emanations of the great conduct and prayers of the bodhisattvas that are in accord with suchness;

original: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 'phrul pa dmigs pa thams cad don yod cing rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs can dang /

translated: the blessing of illuminating all worlds with the meaningful and pure observation of all the miracles of the world systems,

original: sems can thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las rnam par smin pa sgyu ma lta bu la 'jug pa dang / ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yangs pa dang phra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las rnam par smin pa sgyu ma lta bu la 'jug pa dang / ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yangs pa dang phra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma dang /
translated: the inconceivable magical ripening of the karma of all beings, the knowledge of entering into the magical, the knowledge of the vast magical display of wisdom and samādhi, the knowledge of the signs of subtle samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba shes pa dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba shes pa dang / 'di lta ste /

translated: the power of the bodhisattvas, the knowledge of entering into and rising from the domain of the tathāgatas through the understanding of the bodhisattvas,

translated: They are the magical emanations that reveal the body of the Thus-Gone One, and also the emanations of bodhisattvas, the blessings of buddhahood, the emanations of the wheel of Dharma, and the blessings of those to be trained.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud du skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra grag par bya ba rab tu sgrub pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sems ltar mgyogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin /
translated: They are the magical emanations and miracles that are as swift as the mind, and the perfection of being born into the family and lineage of the Thus-Gone One and of accomplishing the proclamation of the sound of buddhahood.

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas brjod pa med pa'i bstan pa dang / ldem po dag rab tu shes te /
translated: Moreover, bodhisattvas fully understand the teachings of the buddhas that are beyond expression and their indirect teachings.

translated: They reveal the magical emanations of the wheel of Dharma through inexpressibly inexpressible quintillions of Dharma doors.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyin zhag gi grangs dang / yud du yan man dang / zla ba'i grangs dang / lo dang / bskal pa'i grangs rab tu shes te /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa bcu po 'di dag la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin te /

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen @288b po la mkhas pa'i ye shes sems can gyi khams tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o //
translated: “This, sons of the victors, is the bodhisattva mahāsattvas’ eighth bhūmi, the bodhisattva bhūmi called the Immovable.

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gi lus dang / mig gi skye mched nas /
translated: “Moreover, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, with his own body and the sense field of his eyes,

original: yid kyi skye mched kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug ste /

original: bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu re rer yang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu re rer yang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba la snyoms par 'jug go /

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi chos nyid kyang der byin gyis rlob ste /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi chos nyid kyang der byin gyis rlob ste /

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yang rab tu shes so //

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the number of world systems, as numerous as the atoms in an inexpressibly vast number of buddha-fields.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs shing dag pas rnam par dag la 'od gsal shing rgyan bzang bo shin tu mang bas rnam pa du mar brgyan cing /

analyzed: rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis shin tu gang bar mthong ste /

translated: for a thousand eons, for a hundred thousand eons, for a trillion eons, for a quintillion eons, for countless eons, for immeasurable eons, for limitless eons, for incomparable eons, for inconceivable eons, for ineffable eons, for ineffably ineffable eons.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang rab tu bstan to //
translated: He revealed the inconceivable eye of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan tshad med pa'ang shin tu brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan tshad med pa'ang shin tu brjod do //
translated: He proclaimed the immeasurable ear of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs mi bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa yang rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs mi bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa yang rab tu bstan to //
translated: He revealed the nose of the Tathagata, which is free from fear.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bo'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang yang dag par bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bo'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang yang dag par bstan to //
translated: He revealed the perfection of the qualities of the foremost son of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rjes su bsgrags pa yang rab tu bshad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rjes su bsgrags pa yang rab tu bshad do //
translated: He explained the proclamation of the Tathagata's miracles.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub mtha' dang dbus med pa yang @291b dag par sbyang ba mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub mtha' dang dbus med pa yang @291b dag par sbyang ba mdzad do //
translated: He purified the boundless enlightenment of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dgongs pas rnam par dag pa'ang thob par mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dgongs pas rnam par dag pa'ang thob par mdzad do //
translated: He caused the attainment of the speech of the Tathagata, which is pure in its intention.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa yang yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa yang yang dag par ston to //
translated: He revealed the irreversible wheel of Dharma of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mtha' yas pa yang rnam par dmigs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mtha' yas pa yang rnam par dmigs pa mdzad do //
translated: He also causes the infinite retinue of the Tathagata to be perceived.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ldem po dag mtha' yas pa la'ang rab tu gzhug pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ldem po dag mtha' yas pa la'ang rab tu gzhug pa mdzad do //
translated: He also causes the infinite indirect teachings of the Tathagata to be engaged.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yang dag par brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yang dag par brjod do //
translated: He also proclaims the roots of virtue of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid la'ang yang dag par zhugs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid la'ang yang dag par zhugs pa mdzad do //
translated: He also causes the equality of the Tathagata to be engaged.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud dus kyi tshad dang mnyam pa yang rab tu brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud dus kyi tshad dang mnyam pa yang rab tu brjod do //
translated: He also proclaims the equality of the time of the lineage and family of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rnam pa dang bye brag thams cad kyang shin tu bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rnam pa dang bye brag thams cad kyang shin tu bstan to //
translated: He also teaches all the aspects and distinctions of the Dharma of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'ang rab tu brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'ang rab tu brjod do //
translated: He also proclaims the perception of the Dharma blessing of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing bstan pa yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing bstan pa yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: He also blesses the teaching of the realm of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung chos kyi sprin gyi char yang rab tu 'bebs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung chos kyi sprin gyi char yang rab tu 'bebs so //
translated: He also caused a rain of Dharma clouds to fall from the speech of the Tathāgata.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par dmigs par bya ba yang yongs su bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par dmigs par bya ba yang yongs su bstan to //
translated: He also revealed the perception of all buddhafields.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang rab tu brjod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang rab tu brjod do //
translated: He also proclaimed the samādhi of all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor kun nas 'dus pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang rnam par dmigs pa mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor kun nas 'dus pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang rnam par dmigs pa mdzad do //
translated: He also caused the perception of the succession of the assemblies of all buddhas to be perceived.

original: @292a *// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang byin gyis brlab par mdzad do //
analyzed: @292a *// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang byin gyis brlab par mdzad do //
translated: He also blessed the inconceivable Dharma of all buddhas.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyang yang dag par bstan to; ;chos thams cad mi 'pho zhing rgyun 'chad pa med pa yang khong du chud par mdzad do //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyang yang dag par bstan to; ;chos thams cad mi 'pho zhing rgyun 'chad pa med pa yang khong du chud par mdzad do //
translated: He also taught the sameness of all dharmas. He also caused the understanding of the non-transference and non-interruption of all dharmas to be understood.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang rab tu rdzogs par mdzad do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan tshad med pa yang yongs su bstan to //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang rab tu rdzogs par mdzad do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan tshad med pa yang yongs su bstan to //
translated: He also revealed the immeasurable qualities of the tathāgatas.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sbyang ba yang khong du chud par mdzad do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sbyang ba yang khong du chud par mdzad do //
translated: He also caused them to understand the purification of all the maṇḍalas of samādhi.

original: sems sgyu ma lta bu mthar thug pa med pa yang rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: sems sgyu ma lta bu mthar thug pa med pa yang rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: He also caused them to accomplish the infinite illusory nature of the mind.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, the bodhisattva bhūmi of Hard to Conquer, has become skilled in the knowledge of the infinite and immeasurable qualities of the tathāgatas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan tha dad pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan tha dad pa /
translated: He has become skilled in the knowledge of the infinite and immeasurable qualities of the buddhas, the bhagavats, with their different names, different families, and different lineages.

original: mtshan re re zhing yang rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' ba mtshan de dag re re'i rnam par dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyang /
analyzed: mtshan re re zhing yang rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' ba mtshan de dag re re'i rnam par dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyang /
translated: each night he blessed his body with as many different names as there are atoms in a million ineffable buddha-fields, and each of those names had as many different aspects as there are atoms in a million ineffable buddha-fields.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' ba dag gis mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshul du lus kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnga' ba dag gis mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshul du lus kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: He blessed his body in an infinite way.🔽He blessed his mind in an unattached way.

original: chags pa med pa'i tshul du sems kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad @292b do; ;chos thams cad nyams pa med pa la gzhol bar dran pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //🔽chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par blo gros kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i tshul du sems kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad @292b do; ;chos thams cad nyams pa med pa la gzhol bar dran pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do // chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par blo gros kyang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: He blessed his memory in a way that was directed toward the nondeficiency of all phenomena.🔽He blessed his intellect in a way that was directed toward the realization of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad shin tu 'dzin par rig pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: chos thams cad shin tu 'dzin par rig pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: He blessed his awareness in a way that was directed toward the retention of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad yangs shing 'byams klas pa'i tshul du blo yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: chos thams cad yangs shing 'byams klas pa'i tshul du blo yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: They also bless their minds to be vast and expansive with respect to all phenomena.

original: mngon par shes pa rnon pos chos tha mi dad pa mkhas pas khong du chud par dbang po tshad med pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnon pos chos tha mi dad pa mkhas pas khong du chud par dbang po tshad med pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: They also bless their faculties to be immeasurable, so that they can understand the nondifferentiation of phenomena with their sharp higher perceptions.

original: byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i tshul du spyod yul thogs pa med pa yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i tshul du spyod yul thogs pa med pa yang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: They also bless their fields of experience to be unobstructed, so that they can understand the realm of phenomena through their blessings.

original: bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par ye shes la 'jug pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par ye shes la 'jug pa'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: They also bless their engagement in wisdom to be pure, with unobstructed wisdom.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'ang byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do //
translated: They also bless their manifestation of perfect buddhahood to be a display in all world systems.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious One!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rgya mtsho'i sgo bcu la shin tu rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rgya mtsho'i sgo bcu la shin tu rtogs pa yin te /
translated: “Bodhisattvas who are in this bodhisattva concentration have ten kinds of understanding of the ocean’s doors.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are those ten?

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bas rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bas rtogs pa yin /
translated: They are: understanding by seeing the ocean of buddhas;

original: sems can rgya mtsho ming gis khong du chud pa yin /
analyzed: sems can rgya mtsho ming gis khong du chud pa yin /
translated: understanding the ocean of beings by their names;

original: chos rgya mtsho ye shes kyis rab tu rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: chos rgya mtsho ye shes kyis rab tu rtogs pa yin /
translated: understanding the ocean of phenomena by wisdom;

original: zhing rgya mtsho la dngos po med par @293a *//🔽gnas shing / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i bsam pas rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
analyzed: zhing rgya mtsho la dngos po med par @293a *// gnas shing / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i bsam pas rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
translated: understanding the ocean of lands by their nonexistence;

original: yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pas rab tu rtogs pa yin /🔽ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnam par dmigs pas khong du chud pa yin /
analyzed: yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pas rab tu rtogs pa yin / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnam par dmigs pas khong du chud pa yin /
translated: understanding the ocean of qualities by their perfection;🔽understanding the ocean of wisdom manifestations by their observation;🔽understanding the ocean of faculties by their analysis;

original: dbang po rgya mtsho rnam par phye ba la mkhas pa'i sa'i ye shes kyis khong du chud pa yin /
analyzed: dbang po rgya mtsho rnam par phye ba la mkhas pa'i sa'i ye shes kyis khong du chud pa yin /
translated: and understanding the ocean of aspirations by their accomplishment.

original: sems rgya mtsho sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi sems tha dad pa dang / sems yangs pa dang / sems tshad med pa yongs su shes pas khong du chud pa yin /
analyzed: sems rgya mtsho sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi sems tha dad pa dang / sems yangs pa dang / sems tshad med pa yongs su shes pas khong du chud pa yin /
translated: They are the understanding of the different, vast, and immeasurable minds of all beings, which is the ocean of mind.

original: spyod pa rgya mtsho smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin /
analyzed: spyod pa rgya mtsho smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin /
translated: They are the accomplishment of the ocean of conduct through prayers.

original: smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' las brgal bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pas yongs su grub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' las brgal bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pas yongs su grub par byed pa yin te /
translated: They are the accomplishment of the ocean of prayers through the purity of the arising of the transcendence of extremes.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de rgya mtsho'i sgo bcu la shin tu rtogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de rgya mtsho'i sgo bcu la shin tu rtogs pa rnams so //
translated: These are the ten ocean-like gates that the bodhisattvas fully comprehend.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ni mchog tu bya ba bcu 'thob pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ni mchog tu bya ba bcu 'thob pa yin te /
translated: “The bodhisattvas attain ten supreme activities.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi phul du bya ba 'thob pa yin /🔽lha thams cad kyi mchog tu bya ba 'thob pa yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi phul du bya ba 'thob pa yin / lha thams cad kyi mchog tu bya ba 'thob pa yin /
translated: They are the attainment of the supreme among all beings,🔽the attainment of the supreme among all gods,

original: tshangs pa khyu mchog thams cad kyi nang na chags pa med pa 'thob pa yin /
analyzed: tshangs pa khyu mchog thams cad kyi nang na chags pa med pa 'thob pa yin /
translated: the attainment of the absence of attachment among all Brahmās and leaders,

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa 'thob pa yin /🔽'gro ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa 'thob pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa 'thob pa yin / 'gro ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa 'thob pa yin /
translated: They attain what is not taken away by any world.🔽They attain what is not overcome by any world.

original: 'gro ba thams cad dang tha mi dad pa 'thob pa yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad dang tha mi dad pa 'thob pa yin /
translated: They attain what is not different from any world.

original: lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas 'byung ba 'thob @293b pa yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas 'byung ba 'thob @293b pa yin /
translated: They attain what arises from all the stages of the path.

original: skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug 'thob pa yin /
analyzed: skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug 'thob pa yin /
translated: They attain mastery over all births.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang 'thob pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang 'thob pa yin /
translated: They attain mastery over all the qualities of the Buddhas.

original: 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la stobs dang shugs 'thob pa yin /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la stobs dang shugs 'thob pa yin /
translated: They attain power and strength over all the manifestations of the elements.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas mchog tu bya ba bcu 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas mchog tu bya ba bcu 'thob pa'o //
translated: These are the ten masteries that the bodhisattvas attain.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ni stobs bcus sems can gyi khams su nan tan byed pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ni stobs bcus sems can gyi khams su nan tan byed pa yin te /
translated: “The bodhisattvas, with these ten powers, apply themselves to the realm of sentient beings.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i stobs kyis 'byung ba'i ded dpon du 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis phyir mi ldog pa dang / chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis dri ma med pa dang / zhi ba'i stobs kyis sgrib pa med pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i stobs kyis 'byung ba'i ded dpon du 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis phyir mi ldog pa dang / chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis dri ma med pa dang / zhi ba'i stobs kyis sgrib pa med pa dang /
translated: In this way, they become a captain who appears through the power of guiding all beings, they become irreversible through the power of diligence, they become stainless through the power of nonattachment, they become free of obscurations through the power of peace,

analyzed: blta na yid du 'ong ba /
translated: They are beautiful to behold.

original: rang bzhin dang zhing shin tu rnam par dag pas brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang zhing shin tu rnam par dag pas brgyan pa ste /
translated: They are adorned with a pure and bright nature.

original: blta na kha dog 'od gsal ba /🔽mun bsal cing snang ba 'byin pa /
analyzed: blta na kha dog 'od gsal ba / mun bsal cing snang ba 'byin pa /
translated: It is clear and bright to behold.🔽It dispels darkness and shines with light.

original: blta na gting mi bra zhing shin tu rnam par phye bar brgyan pa /
analyzed: blta na gting mi bra zhing shin tu rnam par phye bar brgyan pa /
translated: It is deep and clear to behold.

original: kha dog sna tshogs su me tog gis kun nas yogs pa /
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs su me tog gis kun nas yogs pa /
translated: It is covered with flowers of various colors.

original: 'dab ma sna tshogs dang ldan @296b zhing; snying po kha dog sna tshogs can /
analyzed: 'dab ma sna tshogs dang ldan @296b zhing; snying po kha dog sna tshogs can /
translated: It has various petals and various colored anthers.

original: ze ba mdog du mar snang ba'i me tog gis yongs su brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: ze ba mdog du mar snang ba'i me tog gis yongs su brgyan pa ste /
translated: It is adorned with flowers that shine with various colors.

original: mtsho chen po de'i nang dang / mtsho'i dkyil 'khor ni rgyar dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de; zabs su dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do //
analyzed: mtsho chen po de'i nang dang / mtsho'i dkyil 'khor ni rgyar dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de; zabs su dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do //
translated: The great lake is fifty leagues wide and fifty leagues deep.

original: de'i gzhi ni rin po che'i gseg ma bdal ba ste /🔽rin po che sna tshogs kha dog du ma dang ldan pas shin tu brgyan par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gzhi ni rin po che'i gseg ma bdal ba ste / rin po che sna tshogs kha dog du ma dang ldan pas shin tu brgyan par gnas pa'o //
translated: Its bottom is covered with precious gravel.🔽It is adorned with various precious stones of many colors.

original: de'i ngogs ni rin po che sna tshogs pha gu brtsigs pa ltar 'dug pas kun nas 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: de'i ngogs ni rin po che sna tshogs pha gu brtsigs pa ltar 'dug pas kun nas 'khor ba'o //
translated: Its shore is surrounded by a wall of various precious stones.

original: de'i dri ni tsan dan bzang po'i bsung lta bu ste /
analyzed: de'i dri ni tsan dan bzang po'i bsung lta bu ste /
translated: Its fragrance is like the scent of excellent sandalwood.

original: me tog kha dog du ma can las bsung gi ngad rnam pa du ma langs pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: me tog kha dog du ma can las bsung gi ngad rnam pa du ma langs pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: It is endowed with the fragrance of many kinds of flowers.

original: me tog autpa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / punda ri kas kun nas yogs pa /
analyzed: me tog autpa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / punda ri kas kun nas yogs pa /
translated: It is covered with blue lotuses, red lotuses, night lotuses, and white lotuses.

original: rin po che'i shing me tog rab tu rgyas pas kun nas 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: rin po che'i shing me tog rab tu rgyas pas kun nas 'khor ba ste /
translated: It is surrounded by jeweled trees with fully blossomed flowers.

original: nam lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag mtsho'i rin po che dang / gseg ma dang / me tog dang / chu klung gi rgyud gyi bye ma dang / dngo'i kha dang / chu klung gi g-yas phyogs su bskor ba'i mtsho dang /
analyzed: nam lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag mtsho'i rin po che dang / gseg ma dang / me tog dang / chu klung gi rgyud gyi bye ma dang / dngo'i kha dang / chu klung gi g-yas phyogs su bskor ba'i mtsho dang /
translated: When the sun rises, the sun’s rays shine on the jewels in the lake, the sand, the flowers, the sand in the riverbeds, the banks of the rivers, the lakes that circle to the right,

original: rin po che'i shing gi lhun dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog la bab par gyur na /
analyzed: rin po che'i shing gi lhun dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog la bab par gyur na /
translated: and the trunks, branches, leaves, and flowers of the jeweled trees.

original: de'i tshe 'od zer re res phog kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs kyi dbyings na gnas pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kun nas yog pa lta bur snang ste /🔽thams cad kyang 'od kyi mdog dam pa des 'jam 'jam ltar @297a *//
analyzed: de'i tshe 'od zer re res phog kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs kyi dbyings na gnas pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kun nas yog pa lta bur snang ste / thams cad kyang 'od kyi mdog dam pa des 'jam 'jam ltar @297a *//
translated: At that time, even though each ray of light is struck, it appears as if it is completely covered by a net of light rays of various precious origins, with a hundred thousand quintillion.

original: 'dug pas mtsho chen po ma dros pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par snang ngo //
analyzed: 'dug pas mtsho chen po ma dros pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par snang ngo //
translated: Since all of them are soft to the touch with that sublime color of light, the great lake Anavatapta appears with all the most sublime aspects.

original: mtsho chen po ma dros pa de'i 'khor na rin po che rgyan du 'khod pa /
analyzed: mtsho chen po ma dros pa de'i 'khor na rin po che rgyan du 'khod pa /
translated: Around that great lake Anavatapta are arranged precious ornaments,

original: yid du 'ong zhing chal par rgyas la rgya cher 'dal ba de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur par snang ste /
analyzed: yid du 'ong zhing chal par rgyas la rgya cher 'dal ba de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur par snang ste /
translated: pleasing, lush, and vast, all of which appear like a mandala of the sun.

original: rin po che dam pa sna tshogs shin tu phra ba thams cad dang / rin po che'i bye ma kun tu bdal ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs shin tu phra ba dang / rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang / rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i bye ma de ltar phra ba dag la'ang phan tshun du gzugs brnyan snang na chung zhes dog pa'am /
analyzed: rin po che dam pa sna tshogs shin tu phra ba thams cad dang / rin po che'i bye ma kun tu bdal ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs shin tu phra ba dang / rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang / rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba'i bye ma de ltar phra ba dag la'ang phan tshun du gzugs brnyan snang na chung zhes dog pa'am /
translated: all of them reflect the images of each other, without any difference in size,

original: che zhes yangs pa med par dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor bar snang ngo //
analyzed: che zhes yangs pa med par dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor bar snang ngo //
translated: whether small or large, and they appear just as they are, without error.🔽Just as those great rivers flow from the four directions into the great lake Anavatapta,

original: chu klung chen po de dag ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa las kha bzhi nas 'bab pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i chu klung chen po'i 'bab pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa
analyzed: chu klung chen po de dag ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa las kha bzhi nas 'bab pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i chu klung chen po'i 'bab pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa
translated: in the same way, the great river of the four kinds of analytical knowledge of the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: nyid kyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ngo //
analyzed: nyid kyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ngo //
translated: flows into the ocean of omniscience.

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po gangg'a glang po'i kha dngul gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa nas dngul gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po gangg'a glang po'i kha dngul gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa nas dngul gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the great river Ganges flows, carrying silver sand from the mouth of the elephant, which is the color of silver,

original: byang chub sems dpa' chos dkar po dag par byed pa'i sgo nas don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chos dkar po dag par byed pa'i sgo nas don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa /
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattva, through purifying the pure white dharmas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul thams cad @297b yongs su sbyong ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul thams cad @297b yongs su sbyong ba /
translated: purifies all the ways of the Tathagata,

original: don gyi tshul thams cad shin tu dag par byed pa yang chos thams cad kyi snang ba rnam par gsal bar byed cing 'bab ste /
analyzed: don gyi tshul thams cad shin tu dag par byed pa yang chos thams cad kyi snang ba rnam par gsal bar byed cing 'bab ste /
translated: and through purifying all the ways of the meaning, he flows, illuminating the light of all dharmas,

original: bsgribs pa med pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par 'gro'o //
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par 'gro'o //
translated: and goes to the end of the ocean without obstruction.

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po si ta seng ge'i kha rdo rje'i kha dog tu 'dug pa nas rdo rje'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po si ta seng ge'i kha rdo rje'i kha dog tu 'dug pa nas rdo rje'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the great river Sita flows, carrying diamond sand from the mouth of the lion, which is the color of a diamond,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa /
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattva, through the knowledge of the distinctions of dharmas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rdo rje'i tshig rab tu 'dren cing 'bab ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rdo rje'i tshig rab tu 'dren cing 'bab ste /
translated: to illuminate all beings, and to bring down the vajra words of wisdom.

original: chags pa med pa'i rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o //
translated: It flows into the ocean of nonattachment.

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po sindhu glang gi kha gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa nas gser gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po sindhu glang gi kha gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa nas gser gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the great river Sindhu, from the mouth of the elephant with the golden hue, brings down golden sand as it flows,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa /🔽sems can gyi tshogs thams cad khong du chud par byed cing 'gal ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa / sems can gyi tshogs thams cad khong du chud par byed cing 'gal ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa /
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattvas’ knowledge of different languages🔽brings all beings to understanding without contradiction, and satisfies all beings.

original: shin tu 'gro ba yang tshul rnam par dag pa'i yan lag gis yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la rtag tu brtson par 'bab ste /
analyzed: shin tu 'gro ba yang tshul rnam par dag pa'i yan lag gis yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la rtag tu brtson par 'bab ste /
translated: It flows into the ocean of nonattachment, bringing down the branches of pure conduct to ripen those who are ready to be ripened, and always striving to guide beings.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul gyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul gyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o //
translated: They enter the ocean of the way of dependent origination.

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po pakshu rta'i kha bee d'urya sngon po'i kha dog tu 'dug pa nas bee d'urya sngon po'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i spobs @298a *//
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po pakshu rta'i kha bee d'urya sngon po'i kha dog tu 'dug pa nas bee d'urya sngon po'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab pa de bzhin du / byang chub sems dpa'i spobs @298a *//
translated: Just as the great river Ganges, from its source in the Bāhudā country, with its blue water, brings along blue sand,

original: pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa yang chos brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi chu klung rgyun du 'bab par bya ba'i klung rab tu skyed par byed cing chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la gzhol bar 'bab ste /
analyzed: pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa yang chos brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi chu klung rgyun du 'bab par bya ba'i klung rab tu skyed par byed cing chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la gzhol bar 'bab ste /
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattvas’ inexhaustible knowledge of different kinds of eloquence brings along the light of a hundred thousand quintillion inexpressible Dharma teachings and produces the river that constantly flows with the water of the true Dharma, and it flows into the ocean of all Dharmas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro'o //
translated: They enter the ocean of the Dharma of all bodhisattvas.

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag gis mtsho chen po ma dros pa la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag gis mtsho chen po ma dros pa la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
translated: Just as those four great rivers circle the Lake of No Ford to the right,🔽and then flow into the ocean from the four directions,

original: phyogs bzhi nas rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: phyogs bzhi nas rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
translated: in the same way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang lus kyi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang lus kyi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: bodhisattvas have physical actions that are in harmony,

original: ngag gi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: ngag gi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: they have verbal actions that are in harmony,

original: yid kyi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: yid kyi las mthun pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: they have mental actions that are in harmony,

original: mthun pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: mthun pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa yin /
translated: and they have the wisdom that precedes harmony.

original: ji ltar de dag phyogs bzhi nas rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag phyogs bzhi nas rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as those rivers flow into the ocean from the four directions,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang phyogs bzhi nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang phyogs bzhi nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la zhen par 'gro ba yin te /
translated: in the same way, bodhisattvas flow into the ocean of omniscient wisdom from the four directions.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sangs rgyas rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i phyogs dang / 'di lta ste; lus kyi las nges pa dang / gzungs brjed pa med pas yongs su 'dzin pas chos thams cad snang ba'i phyogs dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i phyogs dang / 'di lta ste; lus kyi las nges pa dang / gzungs brjed pa med pas yongs su 'dzin pas chos thams cad snang ba'i phyogs dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: the direction of the appearance of all phenomena by means of the retention of the body’s activity and the retention of the retention of the Dharma;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams @298b cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad dga' bar bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i phyogs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams @298b cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad dga' bar bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i phyogs so //
translated: the direction of the perfections in order to perfect all the bodhisattva practices; and the direction of great compassion in order to perfect the delight of all beings by turning the wheel of the Dharma.

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po de dag gis lan bdun du bskor ba'i bar gyi gling rnams /
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po de dag gis lan bdun du bskor ba'i bar gyi gling rnams /
translated: Just as those great rivers circle the island seven times before flowing into the ocean,

original: me tog autpa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / punda ri kas kun nas yog pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: me tog autpa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / punda ri kas kun nas yog pa de bzhin du /
translated: in the same way, the island is covered with blue lotuses, red lotuses, night lotuses, and white lotuses.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bar ma dor 'dul bar ma gyur ba'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gzhog pa yang ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis kun tu khyab pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bar ma dor 'dul bar ma gyur ba'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gzhog pa yang ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis kun tu khyab pa'o //
translated: He is indifferent to those sentient beings who are not disciplined by the bodhisattva, and he is pervaded by quintillions of concentrations.

original: sangs rgyas mthong bas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong bas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa'o //
translated: He is adorned with the various aspects of seeing the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag cing rdul med pas yid du 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag cing rdul med pas yid du 'ong ba'o //
translated: He is pleasing because of the purity and freedom from dust of the buddha-field.

original: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa rin po che'i shing gis yongs su 'khor ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa rin po che'i shing gis yongs su 'khor ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as Lake Anavatapta is surrounded by precious trees,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ston na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ston na /
translated: so the bodhisattva, when he demonstrates the attainment of enlightenment,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis kun nas 'khor cing brgyan pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis kun nas 'khor cing brgyan pa yin /
translated: is surrounded and adorned by the buddha-field.🔽Just as Lake Anavatapta is fifty leagues in extent, clear, and unmuddied,

original: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod la dang zhing rnyog pa med pa dang gsal ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod la dang zhing rnyog pa med pa dang gsal ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the great lake Anavatapta is fifty leagues across, clear, unmuddied and limpid,🔽

original: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas pas dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas pas dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa yin /
translated: The bodhisattvas’ mind of manifest enlightenment is pure, clear, and unclouded, being expanded by all roots of virtue, and it is without limit or center.

original: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa rin po che'i pha gus @299a *//🔽brtsigs pas mtha' bskor cing /
analyzed: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa rin po che'i pha gus @299a *// brtsigs pas mtha' bskor cing /
translated: Just as the great lake Anavatapta is surrounded by a wall of precious jewels,

original: tsan dan dri zhim po'i bsung dang ldan pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: tsan dan dri zhim po'i bsung dang ldan pa de bzhin du /
translated: and is endowed with the fragrance of sweet-smelling sandalwood,

original: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems kyang ye shes rin po che khrag khrig stong phrag bcus shin tu brgyan cing khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam gyi ye shes dang ldan la dge ba'i rtsa ba dri zhim po thams cad dang ldan pa'o; ;ji
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems kyang ye shes rin po che khrag khrig stong phrag bcus shin tu brgyan cing khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam gyi ye shes dang ldan la dge ba'i rtsa ba dri zhim po thams cad dang ldan pa'o; ;ji
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattvas’ mind of manifest enlightenment is adorned with a trillion jewels of wisdom, endowed with the wisdom of special prayers, and endowed with all the sweet fragrances of roots of virtue.

original: ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang rin po che thams cad kyi gram bus yongs su brgyan cing /
analyzed: ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang rin po che thams cad kyi gram bus yongs su brgyan cing /
translated: Just as the great lake Anavatapta is adorned with a mosaic of all precious substances,

original: nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par gyur pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par gyur pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the ocean is beautified by various precious jewels,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes phra bas khong du chud pa'i dran pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan cing / de ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pas tshul dang dus shes par bya ba thams cad la zhugs pa yin; ji ltar klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa gtse ba dang /
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattvas’ wisdom, which is subtle and penetrating, is adorned with the inconceivable precious liberation of the bodhisattvas.🔽Thus, they are engaged in all the ways and times of the unimpeded conduct of all the buddhas with regard to all the phenomena that arise in this way.🔽Just as the great nāga king Anavatapta is free from all harm and discomfort,

original: mi bde ba thams cad las rnam par 'das pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: mi bde ba thams cad las rnam par 'das pa de bzhin du /

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi gtse ba dang; 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi gtse ba dang; 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te /

analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gnas kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa yin /

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi @299b po de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling mngon par brlan cing yongs su brlan nas rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi @299b po de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling mngon par brlan cing yongs su brlan nas rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as those four great rivers moisten and fully moisten the land of Jambudvīpa and flow into the great ocean,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi chu klung chen po bzhis lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa /

analyzed: tshangs par bcas pa / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgur bcas pa mngon par brlan te /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes rgya mtsho stobs bcus rnam par brgyan pa la zhen par 'gro'o //
translated: with its ascetics and brahmins, and flows into the ocean of wisdom of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, adorned with the ten powers.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i chu klung byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pas rab tu dang ba /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i chu klung byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pas rab tu dang ba /

original: sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan 'dogs shing /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan 'dogs shing /
translated: benefiting all beings,

original: mi zad pa'i rgyun gyi mthar thug pas dus gsum gyi ye shes rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mi zad pa'i rgyun gyi mthar thug pas dus gsum gyi ye shes rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: flowing into the ocean of the wisdom of the three times, with an inexhaustible flow that lasts until the end of time.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi chu klung ting nge 'dzin rin po che grangs med pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi chu klung ting nge 'dzin rin po che grangs med pas brgyan pa /
translated: There was the river of the unequaled wisdom of the bodhisattvas, adorned with countless jewels of samādhi,

analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad lta zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: flowing into the ocean of the wisdom of all the buddhas, seeing all the buddhas.

original: snying rje chen po'i ye shes kyi chu klung byams pa chen po'i dbang du 'gyur ba 'gro ba thams cad nas phyir mi ldog cing 'gro ba thams cad nye bar @300a *//
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i ye shes kyi chu klung byams pa chen po'i dbang du 'gyur ba 'gro ba thams cad nas phyir mi ldog cing 'gro ba thams cad nye bar @300a *//
translated: There was the river of the wisdom of great compassion, flowing with the power of great love, never turning back from all beings,

original: gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to guide all beings.

original: thabs mkhas pa'i mtshams sbyor ba grangs med pas yongs su gdung ba zhi bar byed cing stobs bcu rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa'i mtshams sbyor ba grangs med pas yongs su gdung ba zhi bar byed cing stobs bcu rgya mtsho la zhen par 'bab pa'o //
translated: Through countless skillful means, they pacify all distress and flow into the ocean of the ten powers.

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as those four great rivers flow into the great lake Anavatapta and then flow into the great ocean without ever turning back,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug par 'gro zhing rnam par 'tshang rgya bar rnam par rol pas rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug par 'gro zhing rnam par 'tshang rgya bar rnam par rol pas rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin
translated: in the same way, bodhisattvas, through the conduct of bodhisattvas endowed with special aspirations, go to the end of the inexhaustible gnosis of omniscience and attain enlightenment through the display of enlightenment.

original: / ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag rgya mtsho chen po zhen par 'dong zhing phyir mi ldog pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: / ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag rgya mtsho chen po zhen par 'dong zhing phyir mi ldog pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as those four great rivers flow into the great ocean without ever turning back,

original: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi rgyun ma chad par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par bsgrub pa las phyir mi ldog cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi rgyun ma chad par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par bsgrub pa las phyir mi ldog cing /
translated: The bodhisattvas who are not interrupted in their prayers and who are intent on the prayers of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra will not turn back from accomplishing omniscience.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho zhen par 'gro'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho zhen par 'gro'o //
translated: They will enter the ocean of the wisdom of the tathagatas, who abide in the unobstructed and unattached enlightenment of the buddhas with regard to all phenomena.

original: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag bskal par gnas shing skyo ba dang / yongs su skyo ba med par rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag bskal par gnas shing skyo ba dang / yongs su skyo ba med par rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dong ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as those four great rivers, for an eon, without weariness or exhaustion, enter the ocean,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon @300b lam la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas yongs su mi skyo bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtshor rgyun ma chad par rjes su gzhol zhing
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon @300b lam la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas yongs su mi skyo bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtshor rgyun ma chad par rjes su gzhol zhing
translated: Bodhisattvas who are diligent in the conduct and aspirations of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra will not become weary of engaging in bodhisattva conduct for eons that extend to the end of time. They will continuously and uninterruptedly enter the ocean of wisdom of all the tathagatas.

original: zhen par 'gro ba yin /
analyzed: zhen par 'gro ba yin /
translated: They will go to the state of nonattachment.

original: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa de rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdog ltar 'dug cing /
analyzed: ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa de rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdog ltar 'dug cing /
translated: The great lake Anavatapta has the color of various jewels.

original: dngul gyi bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang / gser gyi bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang / rdo rje'i bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang / bee d'urya'i bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su mngon zhing snang ba dang /
analyzed: dngul gyi bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang / gser gyi bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang / rdo rje'i bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang / bee d'urya'i bye ma'i mdog tu snang ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su mngon zhing snang ba dang /
translated: It appears as silver sand, gold sand, diamond sand, and beryl sand. When struck by the sun’s rays, it appears as the form of the sun’s orb in all its aspects.

original: nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad na mtsho chen po ma dros pa de dmigs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su gyur par snang yang lus kyi gzugs su snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam pa snang bar gyur pa de dag gcig gis gcig bdo zhing phan tshun du gnod par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad na mtsho chen po ma dros pa de dmigs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su gyur par snang yang lus kyi gzugs su snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam pa snang bar gyur pa de dag gcig gis gcig bdo zhing phan tshun du gnod par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: When it comes into contact with the sun’s rays, the great lake Anavatapta appears as the form of all objects, yet it appears as the form of the body and as the forms of various jewels. They do not overpower each other or harm each other.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pas rang gi lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul🔽shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pas rang gi lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu mthong ngo //
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattvas, dwelling in this samādhi of mastery over the dharmadhātu, see in each pore of their own bodies tathāgatas as numerous as the atoms in buddha realms inexpressible beyond inexpressible.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo //

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du'ang @301a *//

original: 'jug go / chos bstan pa'ang nyan to //

analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed do //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /

analyzed: yun thung ngu'i 'du shes kyang mi skye'o //

analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga de dag tu'ang de'i lus la mi bde pa med cing /
