analyzed: 'jug rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the purification of all world systems.

original: 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pas rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pas rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows all the errors of the world without conceptualization.

original: rtog pa'i sa thams @302a *//
analyzed: rtog pa'i sa thams @302a *//
translated: All the stages of conceptualization🔽

original: cad las kyang yongs su 'da'o //
analyzed: cad las kyang yongs su 'da'o //
translated: and they transcend all conceptual states.

original: mtshan ma sna tshogs yongs su shes pa yang mi spong ngo //
analyzed: mtshan ma sna tshogs yongs su shes pa yang mi spong ngo //
translated: They do not abandon the knowledge of various signs.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang thabs la mkhas pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang thabs la mkhas pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the bodhisattvas’ wisdom and skill in means.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa la'ang rtog par mi byed do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa la'ang rtog par mi byed do //
translated: They do not conceptualize complete purity.

original: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sa yang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sa yang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
translated: They attain the stage of the total overcoming of all views.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'ang yin la /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'ang yin la /
translated: the nature of space is such that it pervades all things

original: dngos po thams cad las kyang rnam par 'das pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad las kyang rnam par 'das pa'o //
translated: and yet it transcends all things.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang rgyu la /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang rgyu la /
translated: In the same way, bodhisattvas move through all world systems

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las kyang rnam par 'das pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las kyang rnam par 'das pa yin /
translated: and yet they transcend all world systems.

original: sems can gyi khams yongs su dgrol ba la'ang brtson la /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams yongs su dgrol ba la'ang brtson la /
translated: They strive to liberate the realm of sentient beings🔽and yet they do not apprehend sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi 'du shes thams cad kyang med pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes thams cad kyang med pa yin /
translated: all perceptions of sentient beings are absent,

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyang ye shes kyi spyod yul du gyur la /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyang ye shes kyi spyod yul du gyur la /
translated: the entire expanse of reality is the domain of wisdom,

original: chos thams cad kyis snyems pa'i sems kyang med pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyis snyems pa'i sems kyang med pa yin /
translated: and there is no inflated mind about any phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad blta bas kyang mi ngoms la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad blta bas kyang mi ngoms la /
translated: All buddhas are never gazed upon with enough admiration,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la blta ba'i gnas kyang yongs su bsal ba yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la blta ba'i gnas kyang yongs su bsal ba yin /
translated: and the state of gazing upon all buddhas is also cleared away.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa thams cad la mkhas par bya ba'ang khong du chud la chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud pas chags pa yang med pa yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa thams cad la mkhas par bya ba'ang khong du chud la chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud pas chags pa yang med pa yin /
translated: They have mastered all aspects of meditative absorption, and they have no attachment because they have mastered the suchness of all phenomena.

original: chos kyi tshig rnam par shes pa @302b mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan la /
analyzed: chos kyi tshig rnam par shes pa @302b mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan la /
translated: They have the eloquence of an infinite awareness of the words of the Dharma,

original: tshig med cing yi ge med pa yang khong du chud pa yin /
analyzed: tshig med cing yi ge med pa yang khong du chud pa yin /
translated: and they have mastered the absence of words and letters.

original: brjod du med pa la yang shin tu spyod la /
analyzed: brjod du med pa la yang shin tu spyod la /
translated: They engage in the inexpressible,

original: dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan pa yin /
translated: and they are endowed with the purity of the aspects of speech.

original: chos thams cad kyi yang mthar phyin la /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi yang mthar phyin la /
translated: They have reached the ultimate point of all phenomena.

original: gzugs sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba rnams kyang yul du byed pa yin /
analyzed: gzugs sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba rnams kyang yul du byed pa yin /
translated: They experience the objects that are to be guided by means of various forms.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar yang rab tu thug la /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar yang rab tu thug la /
translated: They have reached the ultimate nature of all phenomena.

original: snying rje chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su dgrol zhing gdul ba la yang rab tu brtson pa yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su dgrol zhing gdul ba la yang rab tu brtson pa yin /
translated: They are dedicated to liberating and guiding all realms of sentient beings with great compassion.

original: sems can gyi khams 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa yang rab tu shes la /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa yang rab tu shes la /
translated: They know that the realm of sentient beings neither increases nor decreases.

original: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa khong du chud pa las kyang mi g-yo ba yin /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa khong du chud pa las kyang mi g-yo ba yin /
translated: They do not move from their understanding of the all-pervasiveness of the realm of phenomena.

original: 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba yang rgyun mi gcod la /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba yang rgyun mi gcod la /
translated: They do not interrupt the guidance of all beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag par khong du chud pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag par khong du chud pa yin /
translated: They understand the conduct of the thus-gone ones, which is completely pure in the three spheres.

original: chos rnam pa sna tshogs la'ang rnam par mi rtog la /
analyzed: chos rnam pa sna tshogs la'ang rnam par mi rtog la /
translated: They are free of concepts with regard to the various phenomena.

original: bstan pa sna tshogs la 'jigs pa med pas chos bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang rgyun mi 'chad pa yin /
analyzed: bstan pa sna tshogs la 'jigs pa med pas chos bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang rgyun mi 'chad pa yin /
translated: And because they are fearless in the various teachings, the wheel of the Dharma of teaching the Dharma is uninterrupted.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings la dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o //
translated: this is the ninth bodhisattva ground, called The One of Certain Conduct.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye @303a *//
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po la mkhas pa'i ye @303a *//
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: shes bcu pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: shes bcu pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is the bodhisattvas’ and great beings’ tenth knowledge of the expertise in the vast aspects of absorption?

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /🔽'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med cing /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med cing /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
translated: here the bodhisattva great beings enter into the bodhisattva absorption called The Stainless One.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe /
translated: When they enter into this absorption,

original: lus kyi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
analyzed: lus kyi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
translated: He is perfectly established in the unattached activity of the body.

original: ngag gi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
analyzed: ngag gi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
translated: He is perfectly established in the unattached activity of speech.

original: yid kyi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
analyzed: yid kyi las chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
translated: He is perfectly established in the unattached activity of mind.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //
translated: He is perfectly established in the unattached sameness of the buddhafields.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes chags pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug go /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes chags pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug go /
translated: He engages in the unattached knowledge of ripening beings.

original: sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so //🔽'od zer kun tu dgye ba chags pa med pa rab tu 'gyed do //
analyzed: sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes chags pa med par yang dag par gnas so // 'od zer kun tu dgye ba chags pa med pa rab tu 'gyed do //
translated: He is perfectly established in the unattached knowledge of training beings.🔽He radiates the unattached light rays.

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chags pa med pa rab tu gtong ngo //
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chags pa med pa rab tu gtong ngo //
translated: He emits the unattached halo of light.

original: sprul pa mang po chags pa med pa rab tu 'gyed do //
analyzed: sprul pa mang po chags pa med pa rab tu 'gyed do //
translated: He radiates the unattached emanations.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo chags pa med pa rab tu bskor ro //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo chags pa med pa rab tu bskor ro //
translated: He turns the unattached wheel of the Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'ang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'ang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
translated: He attains the unattached power of the bodhisattva.

original: sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams la yang yang dag par 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams la yang yang dag par 'jug go /
translated: He enters into the powers of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang rab tu 'thob par byed do //
translated: He attains the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bzhengs pas rnam par ldang ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bzhengs pas rnam par ldang ngo //
translated: He arises through the arising of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba snang @303b bas nye bar spyod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba snang @303b bas nye bar spyod do //
translated: He experiences the emanations of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /🔽thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu rtog go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i tshe / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu rtog go /
translated: “When the bodhisattva is in this samādhi,🔽he comprehends omniscience.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su blta'o //🔽thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su blta'o // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par byed do //
translated: He sees omniscience.🔽He understands omniscience.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par byed do //
translated: He realizes omniscience.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs par byed do //
translated: He perceives omniscience.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu lta'o; ;thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rjes su blta'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu lta'o; ;thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rjes su blta'o //
translated: He sees omniscience. He sees the subsequent omniscience.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par lta ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par lta ste /
translated: He sees omniscience in all ways.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de /🔽byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khong du chud pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa chen po dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khong du chud pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa chen po dang /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva🔽does not cut off the bodhisattva’s great aspiration, the bodhisattva’s great mind, the bodhisattva’s great conduct, the bodhisattva’s great understanding, the bodhisattva’s great realization,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs chen po dang; byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun chen po yongs su mi gcod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs chen po dang; byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun chen po yongs su mi gcod do //
translated: the bodhisattva’s great illumination, the bodhisattva’s great birth, the bodhisattva’s great empowerment, the bodhisattva’s great emanations, and the bodhisattva’s great stream.

original: ldog par mi byed do //
analyzed: ldog par mi byed do //
translated: He does not turn back.

original: skyo bar mi byed do //
analyzed: skyo bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not become weary.

original: gtong bar mi byed do //🔽'gyed par mi byed do //🔽sgyid lug par mi byed do //
analyzed: gtong bar mi byed do // 'gyed par mi byed do // sgyid lug par mi byed do //
translated: He does not give up.🔽He does not become discouraged.🔽He does not become lazy.

original: gzhog par mi byed do //
analyzed: gzhog par mi byed do //
translated: He does not become confused.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun mthar phyin par mi byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun mthar phyin par mi byed do //
translated: He does not end the continuum of the bodhisattva.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos @304a *//
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos @304a *//
translated: Because the bodhisattva has accomplished the great vow of the Dharma,

original: la smon lam chen pos rab tu grub pa dang / yang dag par 'jug pa'i 'byung gnas chen po dang / 'jigs pa'i pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho chen po shin tu bslabs pas /
analyzed: la smon lam chen pos rab tu grub pa dang / yang dag par 'jug pa'i 'byung gnas chen po dang / 'jigs pa'i pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho chen po shin tu bslabs pas /
translated: the great source of correct engagement, and has trained in the great ocean of the fearless Dharma of the Buddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he possesses the especially exalted aspirations of the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he possesses the special conduct of the bodhisattva.

original: thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes snang ba la shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes snang ba la shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he has trained in the light of the wisdom of skillful means.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he understands the emanations of the bodhisattva.

original: sems can thams cad kyi gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is blessed by the foremost of all sentient beings.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i rjes su snyegs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i rjes su snyegs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they follow the great compassion of all the Buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gyur ba med pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gyur ba med pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they accomplish the unchanging Dharma of the Buddha.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / mi la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che sna tshogs tshon gyis bsgyur pa'i gos kyi steng du bzhag na /
analyzed: dper na / mi la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che sna tshogs tshon gyis bsgyur pa'i gos kyi steng du bzhag na /
translated: Suppose someone were to place a precious gem on a piece of cloth of various colors.

original: nor bu rin po che de yang khong nas tshon gyis gyur par snang ste /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che de yang khong nas tshon gyis gyur par snang ste /
translated: The precious gem would appear as though it were colored,

original: nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni 'gyur ba med do //
translated: but the nature of the precious gem does not change.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin rin po che thob pa'i ye shes kyi sgos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su lta zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin rin po che thob pa'i ye shes kyi sgos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su lta zhing /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva, by the power of wisdom gained through attaining the precious samādhi, sees omniscience,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'ang rgyun mi gcod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'ang rgyun mi gcod do //
translated: and does not interrupt the practice of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: @304b ji ltar nor bu rin po che de kha dog thams cad ston kyang nor bu'i rang bzhin yongs su mi spong ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: @304b ji ltar nor bu rin po che de kha dog thams cad ston kyang nor bu'i rang bzhin yongs su mi spong ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as a precious jewel shows all colors without abandoning its own nature,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan can yongs su mi spong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan can yongs su mi spong ngo //
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattva shows all the natures of the bodhisattva conduct without abandoning the qualities of omniscience.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the bodhisattva is engaged in the welfare of all beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad dgrol bar smon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad dgrol bar smon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he aspires to liberate all beings.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he never turns back from pleasing all the buddhas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bas sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bas sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is never discouraged from purifying all world systems.

original: 'gro ba thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is never tired of engaging in all the activities of beings.

original: chos rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med cing tshad med pas yongs su yi 'chad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med cing tshad med pas yongs su yi 'chad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the ocean of Dharma is without middle or end, and is immeasurable and inexhaustible.

original: sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i dmigs pas rnam par 'phel ba thams cad ston pa'i las phyir 'gyod pa med pa'i phyir ro //🔽'gro ba thams cad la rim gro bya bas snyoms pa med cing sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i dmigs pas rnam par 'phel ba thams cad ston pa'i las phyir 'gyod pa med pa'i phyir ro // 'gro ba thams cad la rim gro bya bas snyoms pa med cing sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absence of regret in the activity of teaching the development of all beings through the purification of beings.🔽Because of the absence of weariness in the service of all beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad snang bar bya bas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad snang bar bya bas skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absence of fatigue in the illumination of all beings.

original: chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa las phyir mi ldog cing yongs su skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa las phyir mi ldog cing yongs su skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absence of turning back in the entry into the infinite doors of the Dharma.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing rten kyang ngal ba med cing dub pa med la @305a *//
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing rten kyang ngal ba med cing dub pa med la @305a *//
translated: For example, the nature of space holds and supports all world-realms without weariness, without fatigue,

original: nyam chung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: nyam chung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: without weakness,

original: rga bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rga bar mi 'gyur /
translated: without aging,

original: 'jig par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'jig par mi 'gyur /
translated: without destruction,

original: 'gyes par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gyes par mi 'gyur /
translated: It does not become divided.

original: byang bar mi 'gyur /🔽rnam pa tha dad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: byang bar mi 'gyur / rnam pa tha dad par mi 'gyur /
translated: It does not become exhausted.🔽It does not become differentiated.

original: rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur /
translated: It does not become otherwise.

original: dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur /
translated: It does not become a different thing.

original: rang bzhin rnam par mi spong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnam par mi spong ngo //
translated: It does not abandon its nature.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyang phyir ro //🔽de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang smon lam chen po rgya che zhing yangs la tshad med pa dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyang phyir ro // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang smon lam chen po rgya che zhing yangs la tshad med pa dang ldan pas /
translated: Because it is the nature of space, the essence of reality.

original: sems can thams cad dgrol ba la nye bar gnas pa'i sgos skyo zhing dub pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dgrol ba la nye bar gnas pa'i sgos skyo zhing dub pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: In the same way, a bodhisattva, endowed with great aspirations, vast, extensive, and immeasurable, does not become weary or discouraged in liberating all sentient beings.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / mya ngan las 'das pa ni dus gsum gyi sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa de snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las zlo yang bar 'ga' tsam yang skyo ba med cing sgyid lug pa med de /
analyzed: dper na / mya ngan las 'das pa ni dus gsum gyi sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa de snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las zlo yang bar 'ga' tsam yang skyo ba med cing sgyid lug pa med de /
translated: For example, nirvāṇa, in liberating that many sentient beings, without end or middle, in the three times, is never at all weary, never discouraged,

original: yongs su yi chad pa med do //
analyzed: yongs su yi chad pa med do //
translated: and never gives up.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi dben pa nyid de /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi dben pa nyid de /
translated: The ultimate nirvāṇa is the disengagement of all phenomena.

original: de bas na gang las kyang phyir nur bar bya ba med do //
analyzed: de bas na gang las kyang phyir nur bar bya ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no turning back from anywhere.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'gro ba thams cad gdon pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'gro ba thams cad gdon pa'i phyir /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva, in order to liberate all beings,

original: 'jig rten du skyes pas sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba la skyo ba'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: 'jig rten du skyes pas sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba la skyo ba'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: is born in the world and does not become discouraged about liberating all beings.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' de snyed cig byang chub kyi don du gnas @305b kyang skyo ba dub pa med de /
analyzed: dper na / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' de snyed cig byang chub kyi don du gnas @305b kyang skyo ba dub pa med de /
translated: For example, although so many bodhisattvas are established in enlightenment for the sake of enlightenment in omniscience, they are not discouraged or exhausted.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi mnga' bsgyur ba la bsgrubs so //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi mnga' bsgyur ba la bsgrubs so //
translated: Those of the past, present, and future are established in the mastery of the Buddha,🔽are established,

original: sgrub bo // bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub bo // bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will be established.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni zad pa med pa'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni zad pa med pa'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because they have attained the inexhaustible nature of things.

original: de las gzhan du 'gyur ba med cing /
analyzed: de las gzhan du 'gyur ba med cing /
translated: It is not subject to change into anything else.🔽

original: 'dul ba'i chos la mngon par chags pa med pas phyir nur ba med do //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i chos la mngon par chags pa med pas phyir nur ba med do //
translated: He does not turn away from the Dharma, because he is not attached to the Dharma of the Vinaya.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mang po bdag gis thob par byed cing khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mang po bdag gis thob par byed cing khong du chud par byed do //
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva, having attained the samādhi of omniscience, penetrates it.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de'i ting nge 'dzin de ni /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de'i ting nge 'dzin de ni /
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva’s samādhi

original: 'od phyogs thams cad kyi mthas klas par 'dal ba /
analyzed: 'od phyogs thams cad kyi mthas klas par 'dal ba /
translated: is vast, extending to the limits of all the directions.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer thogs pa med pa /
translated: It is unimpeded in all world systems.

original: yon tan sna tshogs du ma'i snying po can gos brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba; rin po che brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba /
analyzed: yon tan sna tshogs du ma'i snying po can gos brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba; rin po che brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba /
translated: It is the essence of many different qualities. It is the source of innumerable garments, the source of innumerable jewels,

original: spos brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba /
analyzed: spos brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung ba /
translated: the source of innumerable incenses,

original: rgyan dang lhab lhub du ma dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rgyan dang lhab lhub du ma dang ldan pa /
translated: and it is endowed with many ornaments and adornments.

original: gser gyi dra ba rgya chen pos kun nas yogs pa /
analyzed: gser gyi dra ba rgya chen pos kun nas yogs pa /
translated: It is covered with a vast golden net.

original: dril bu'i dra ba'i sgra kun nas 'byung ba /
analyzed: dril bu'i dra ba'i sgra kun nas 'byung ba /
translated: the sound of the ringing of bells,

original: blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa /
analyzed: blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa /
translated: beautiful to behold, delightful, with an inconceivable treasury of various jewels,

original: rin po che sna tshogs mang po ston pas dag cing bzang po spyod pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs mang po ston pas dag cing bzang po spyod pa /
translated: pure and good, with a display of many various jewels,

original: gnas shin tu bstan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo ston pa'i yon tan can /
analyzed: gnas shin tu bstan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo ston pa'i yon tan can /
translated: with the quality of revealing the gateway to omniscience,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos byin gyis brlabs pa /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa thams @306a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos byin gyis brlabs pa / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa thams @306a *//
translated: blessed by many tathagatas,

original: cad kyis yang dag par byung bas rnam par snang ba /
analyzed: cad kyis yang dag par byung bas rnam par snang ba /
translated: with a radiance that arises from all pure roots of virtue,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal gyi byin dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal gyi byin dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with the splendor of all tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba /
translated: arisen from the blessing of all tathagatas,

original: lus gcig tu gnas kyang phyogs bcu brjod du med cing /
analyzed: lus gcig tu gnas kyang phyogs bcu brjod du med cing /
translated: though remaining in one body, with the ability to manifest bodies in the ten directions,

original: tshad med par byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i go 'phang dang / yon tan tshad med pa grangs med pa brgya stong rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med par byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i go 'phang dang / yon tan tshad med pa grangs med pa brgya stong rnam par dag pa /
translated: It is the level from which bodhisattvas appear immeasurably and the source of the pure, immeasurable, countless hundreds of thousands of qualities.

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mthun zhing gnas su gyur pa /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mthun zhing gnas su gyur pa /
translated: It is the source of all that is perfect and in harmony with omniscience.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mthun zhing gnas su gyur pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mthun zhing gnas su gyur pas /
translated: It is the source of all the buddhas’ omniscience.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba 'byung bar byed pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba 'byung bar byed pa /
translated: It is the source of the light of all the buddhas.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa /
translated: It is the source of the stūpa for all beings.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi phyag bya zhing mdun du bya bar 'os pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi phyag bya zhing mdun du bya bar 'os pa /
translated: It is the source of the homage and veneration of all worlds.

original: chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i mthun pa'i 'bras bu sprul pa kun tu 'gyed pa /
analyzed: chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i mthun pa'i 'bras bu sprul pa kun tu 'gyed pa /
translated: It is the source of the emanations that are the magical illusion-like concordant effect of the nature of phenomena.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dpe dang dpe med pa'i yon tan can te /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dpe dang dpe med pa'i yon tan can te /
translated: It is the source of the qualities that are both exemplified and beyond example for all beings.

original: de la gnas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung gcig tu gnas shing /
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung gcig tu gnas shing /
translated: When bodhisattvas abide in that bhūmi, they remain in a single cross-legged posture.

original: de'i bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe /
translated: When he perfects that nature,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gcig gis yongs su khyab par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gcig gis yongs su khyab par 'gyur te /
translated: he pervades with a single bodhisattva cross-legged posture all the world systems without exception.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste de ltar gnas pa'i @306b tshe ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste de ltar gnas pa'i @306b tshe ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung ste /
translated: When he abides in that way, from a single pore of his body emerge as many light rays as there are atoms in a million billion countless buddha-fields.

original: ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas ji lta ba de bzhin du ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer gyi sgo de snyed de snyed 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas ji lta ba de bzhin du ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer gyi sgo de snyed de snyed 'byung ngo //
translated: And just as from a single pore, so from all his pores emerge that many doors of light rays.

original: 'od zer gyi sgo de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i snying po can kha dog du mar snang ba /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi sgo de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i snying po can kha dog du mar snang ba /
translated: From each of those light rays there appeared as many jewel canopies as there are atoms in a million trillion ineffable buddha-realms, with the essence of the luminous jewel, appearing in many colors,

original: rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with various ornaments,

original: yon tan gyi rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yon tan gyi rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with many aspects of qualities,

original: rin po che'i dra ba rgya chen pos kun nas khebs pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i dra ba rgya chen pos kun nas khebs pa /
translated: covered with a vast net of jewels,

original: me tog gi dra ba rgya chen pos yongs su khebs pa /
analyzed: me tog gi dra ba rgya chen pos yongs su khebs pa /
translated: covered with a vast net of flowers,

original: spos rin po che khrag khrig brgya stong kun tu gtong ba /
analyzed: spos rin po che khrag khrig brgya stong kun tu gtong ba /
translated: emitting myriads of precious incenses,

original: rin po che'i rgyan yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyan yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can /
translated: having the essence of various beautiful precious ornaments,

original: rin po che'i gdugs bsam gyis mi khyab pas bkab pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: rin po che'i gdugs bsam gyis mi khyab pas bkab pa 'byung ste /
translated: and covered with inconceivable precious parasols.

original: rin po che de dag re re las kyang khang pa brtsegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //🔽khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re las kyang seng ge'i khri padmo'i snying po can sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rin po che de dag re re las kyang khang pa brtsegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re las kyang seng ge'i khri padmo'i snying po can sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
translated: From each of those jewels there appeared as many kūṭāgāras as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion buddha-fields.

original: seng ge'i khri padmo'i snying po can de dag re re las kyang 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba @307a *//🔽khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
analyzed: seng ge'i khri padmo'i snying po can de dag re re las kyang 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba @307a *// khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
translated: From each kūṭāgāra there appeared as many lion thrones with cores of lotus flowers as there are atoms in a hundred thousand uncountable quintillion buddha-fields.🔽From each lion throne with a core of lotus flowers there appeared as many lights as there are atoms in a hundred thousand uncountable quintillion buddha-fields.

original: 'od de dag re re las kyang kha dog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'od de dag re re las kyang kha dog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
translated: From each light there appeared as many colors as there are atoms in a hundred thousand uncountable buddha-fields.

original: kha dog de dag re re las kyang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //🔽snang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag re re las kyang nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba sna tshogs kyi me tog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
analyzed: kha dog de dag re re las kyang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // snang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag re re las kyang nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba sna tshogs kyi me tog sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
translated: From each of those colors, a circle of light, as numerous as the atoms in a million trillion ineffable buddha realms, appeared.🔽From each of those circles of light, a flower of various shining jewels, as numerous as the atoms in a million trillion ineffable buddha realms, appeared.

original: me tog de dag re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
analyzed: me tog de dag re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
translated: From each of those flowers, an array of all jewels, as numerous as the atoms in a million trillion ineffable buddha realms, appeared.

original: rgyan de dag re re las kyang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //🔽khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char rab tu 'bab bo //
analyzed: rgyan de dag re re las kyang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char rab tu 'bab bo //
translated: And from each of those ornaments came forth as many as there are atoms in ten ineffable hundreds of thousands of quintillions of buddhafields of the power of the best of the best.🔽And from each of those powers of the best of the best came down in the form of rain as many as there are atoms in ten quintillion buddhafields of the rain of the Dharma, the teachings of the Buddha.

original: chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba'i char de dag las kyang chos khong du chud par bya bar mdo'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin @307b tu phra ba snyed yongs su brjod do //
analyzed: chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba'i char de dag las kyang chos khong du chud par bya bar mdo'i tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin @307b tu phra ba snyed yongs su brjod do //
translated: And from each of those rains of the Dharma, the divisions of the Dharma, came forth as many as there are atoms in ten quintillion buddhafields of the ways of the sutras for understanding the Dharma.

original: mdo'i tshul yongs su brjod pa de dag re re las kyang chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu ston to //
analyzed: mdo'i tshul yongs su brjod pa de dag re re las kyang chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu ston to //
translated: And from each of those ways of teaching the sūtras, he taught as many Dharma doors as there are atoms in a quintillion ineffable buddha realms.

original: chos kyi sgo rab tu bstan pa de dag re re zhing yang ye shes rdo rje lta bus gtan la phebs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo /
analyzed: chos kyi sgo rab tu bstan pa de dag re re zhing yang ye shes rdo rje lta bus gtan la phebs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo /
translated: And he turned the wheel of Dharma that is established by the vajra-like wisdom,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs sna tshogs dang ldan pa bstan pa rgya chen po can /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs sna tshogs dang ldan pa bstan pa rgya chen po can /
translated: which is endowed with various Dharma categories, which is a vast teaching,

original: chos kyi tshig rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan par 'khor ba /
analyzed: chos kyi tshig rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan par 'khor ba /
translated: which is turned with various Dharma phrases,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor ro //
translated: and which is turned in a quintillion buddha realms.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: Each of those turnings of the wheel of Dharma brings to maturity as many realms of sentient beings as there are atoms in a quintillion ineffable buddhafields.

original: sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba 'byams klas pa de dag re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dul
analyzed: sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba 'byams klas pa de dag re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dul
translated: Each of those infinite realms of sentient beings to be brought to maturity is itself the site of the taming of as many beings in the buddha’s teachings as there are atoms in a quintillion ineffable buddhafields.

original: te / de ltar snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa /
analyzed: te / de ltar snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa /
translated: Thus, they enter into meditative absorption and display vast emanations.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi yul zil gyis mi non pa sprul pa'i sgyu ma sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa med pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi yul zil gyis mi non pa sprul pa'i sgyu ma sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa med pa /
translated: They are not overwhelmed by the domain of meditative absorption, and they are not attached to the various emanations and illusions.

original: rang bzhin tshad med pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin tshad med pa /
translated: They are immeasurable by nature.

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa /
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa /
translated: They are without limit or center.

original: brjod du med pa dang ldan pa /🔽chos kyi dbyings rdul med @308a *//
analyzed: brjod du med pa dang ldan pa / chos kyi dbyings rdul med @308a *//
translated: It is inexpressible.

original: pa'i rang bzhin can /
analyzed: pa'i rang bzhin can /
translated: It is the nature of the realm of phenomena, which is free from dust.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid can /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid can /
translated: It is characterized by the limit of reality.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la spyod pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la spyod pa /
translated: It is the conduct of the family of the tathāgatas.

original: chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa /
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa /
translated: It is the ultimate that is free from attachment.

original: gnas med pa /
analyzed: gnas med pa /
translated: It is without location.

original: len pa med pa /
analyzed: len pa med pa /
translated: It is without grasping.

original: rtsa ba med pa /
analyzed: rtsa ba med pa /
translated: It is without a root.

original: zab pa / gting dpag dka' ba /
analyzed: zab pa / gting dpag dka' ba /
translated: It is profound and difficult to fathom.

original: mngon sum du khong du chud pas rab tu rtog pa /
analyzed: mngon sum du khong du chud pas rab tu rtog pa /
translated: It is realized through direct realization.

original: tshad med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa /
translated: It is immeasurable.

original: rmongs pa med pa /
analyzed: rmongs pa med pa /
translated: It is without delusion.

original: gzhi med pa /
analyzed: gzhi med pa /
translated: It is without a basis.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas gzhi med pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas gzhi med pa dang ldan pa /
translated: It is the realm of the realm of phenomena, which is without a basis.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa /
translated: It is praised by all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.🔽It is the result that is in accord with the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu can; sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su snyegs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu can; sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su snyegs pa /
translated: It is the domain of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gcig pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gcig pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa /
translated: It is the direct perception of bodhisattvas in their last lifetime.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mig rdul med pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mig rdul med pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the eye of a bodhisattva, which is free of dust.

original: shes rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa can /
analyzed: shes rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa can /
translated: He had the eye of wisdom, which is all-pervading.

original: sha'i mig rdul dang bral zhing rdul med par yang dag par skyes pa /
analyzed: sha'i mig rdul dang bral zhing rdul med par yang dag par skyes pa /
translated: He had the eye of flesh, which is free of dust and is perfectly born.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu snang ba can /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu snang ba can /
translated: He had the eye of a buddha, which is all-illuminating.

original: ye shes kyi mig ces bya ba'i don gyi yul dang / rnam pa rab tu ston pa can chos kyi sgo 'byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi mig ces bya ba'i don gyi yul dang / rnam pa rab tu ston pa can chos kyi sgo 'byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: He was a holy being who had opened the door of the Dharma and had perfectly entered the bodhisattva’s mind, which is called the eye of wisdom, the object of which is the display of the aspects of the Dharma.

original: yul la thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: yul la thogs pa med pa /
translated: He was unimpeded in his domain.

original: ye shes kyi rnam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rnam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa /
translated: He was the source of the aspects of wisdom.

original: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
translated: He was exalted above all worlds.

original: skye ba med pa yang dag par byung ba /
analyzed: skye ba med pa yang dag par byung ba /
translated: He was born from the unborn.

original: rnam par 'phrul pas skye ba kun tu ston pa /
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pas skye ba kun tu ston pa /
translated: He displayed birth through his emanations.

original: byin gyi rlabs @308b mi yul la mkhas pa /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs @308b mi yul la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in the blessing of the human realm.

original: yon tan mchog gis rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: yon tan mchog gis rnam par dag pa /
translated: He was pure with the supreme qualities.

original: bsam pa 'od gsal ba'i snying po can /
analyzed: bsam pa 'od gsal ba'i snying po can /
translated: He had the essence of a clear intention.

original: mos pa shin tu dag pas ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings kun nas khebs pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mos pa shin tu dag pas ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings kun nas khebs pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with the wisdom that completely covers the realm of space with pure aspiration.

original: 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis blta bar 'os pa /🔽smon lam mngon du gyur pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis blta bar 'os pa / smon lam mngon du gyur pa /
translated: He was worthy of being seen by the assembly of noble ones.🔽He had fulfilled his aspirations.

original: 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: He had fulfilled his wishes.

original: yon tan bsngags pa zad mi shes pa /
analyzed: yon tan bsngags pa zad mi shes pa /
translated: His praiseworthy qualities were inexhaustible.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag mthong gi mdzod du gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag mthong gi mdzod du gyur pa /
translated: He was the treasury of the wisdom of all the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'byung gnas rgya mtshor gyur pa ye shes rin po che thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'byung gnas rgya mtshor gyur pa ye shes rin po che thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
translated: He was the ocean that was the source of the buddhas’ enlightenment, completely adorned with all precious wisdom.🔽He was the person of wisdom who was born as Puṇyaraśmi.

original: ye shes kyi skyes bu punda ri kar byung ba; sems can gyi don mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu sgrub pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi skyes bu punda ri kar byung ba; sems can gyi don mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu sgrub pa /
translated: He was accomplishing the benefit of beings without limit or center.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mu med pa la zhugs pa'i 'od zer gyis snang bar gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mu med pa la zhugs pa'i 'od zer gyis snang bar gyur pa /
translated: He was illuminated by the light rays that had entered the infinite wisdom of the buddhas.🔽He was the light of wisdom that was completely illuminating.

original: ye shes kyi 'od yongs su snang ba; chos rnam par dag pa snang bas kun tu spyod pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'od yongs su snang ba; chos rnam par dag pa snang bas kun tu spyod pa /
translated: He was engaged in the illumination of the pure Dharma.

original: shin tu dben pa'i sgor gyur pa /
analyzed: shin tu dben pa'i sgor gyur pa /
translated: He was the door to complete solitude.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med par dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med par dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa /
translated: the culmination of the wisdom that perceives all the qualities of the buddhas without obstruction,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with the methods of enlightenment of all the buddhas,

original: yon tan gyi spyod pa las byung ba /
analyzed: yon tan gyi spyod pa las byung ba /
translated: arisen from the conduct of qualities,

original: skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rab tu shes pa /
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rab tu shes pa /
translated: fully knowing the way of the holy being, the bodhisattva,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bcun spu la rab tu gnas pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bcun spu la rab tu gnas pa /
translated: firmly abiding in the bodhisattva’s pores,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pas rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pas rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: fully engaged through being truly contemplated by all the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i byin dang / snying po can /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i byin dang / snying po can /
translated: endowed with the essence of the blessing of the buddhas’ dharmakāya,

original: dran pa bsam gyis mi @309a *//
analyzed: dran pa bsam gyis mi @309a *//
translated: inconceivable mindfulness,

original: khyab pa rtse gcig tu gyur pa /
analyzed: khyab pa rtse gcig tu gyur pa /
translated: one-pointed,

original: dmigs pa med pa'i yul dang mtshan ma ston pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i yul dang mtshan ma ston pa /
translated: teaching the signless object,

original: shin tu yangs pa las yang dag par byung ba'i rgyud can /
analyzed: shin tu yangs pa las yang dag par byung ba'i rgyud can /
translated: having a continuum that arises from the vast,

original: chags pa med pa'i spyod yul du khong du chud pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis byang chub tshad med pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing sa mtshams med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi don byed pa /
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i spyod yul du khong du chud pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis byang chub tshad med pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing sa mtshams med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi don byed pa /
translated: They were the realm of phenomena, which is comprehended as the domain of nonattachment; the immeasurable enlightenment of space, which is the vast domain of the buddhas, which is without boundaries; the benefit of beings in all worlds;

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i yul rnam par non pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i yul rnam par non pa /
translated: the domain of the immeasurable wisdom that is the cause and root of virtue of omniscience;

original: dag cing drag shul che ba'i ye shes kyis grub pa /
analyzed: dag cing drag shul che ba'i ye shes kyis grub pa /
translated: the accomplishment of pure, powerful wisdom;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang yang dag par 'grogs pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang yang dag par 'grogs pa /
translated: the perfect companions of the bodhisattvas’ thoughts;

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs dag par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs dag par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
translated: the purification of the lineage of all bodhisattvas; the delightful enlightenment of the tathāgatas;

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba'i thabs shes pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba'i thabs shes pa /
translated: the knowledge of the subtle methods of the faultlessness of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas;

original: rtogs pa rdo rje lta bu'i stobs dang mthus byung ba /
analyzed: rtogs pa rdo rje lta bu'i stobs dang mthus byung ba /
translated: It arises through the power and strength of vajra-like realization.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rtogs par gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rtogs par gyur pa /
translated: It is realized through the blessings of the buddhas.

original: sems can gyis thos par dka' ba /
analyzed: sems can gyis thos par dka' ba /
translated: It is difficult for beings to hear.

original: mi gnyis pa'i sgor zhugs pa /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa'i sgor zhugs pa /
translated: It enters the door of nonduality.

original: chos kyi tshul mtshan nyid med pa la gzhol ba /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul mtshan nyid med pa la gzhol ba /
translated: It is directed toward the characteristic of the way of the Dharma.

original: mtshan ma'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: mtshan ma'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa /
translated: It is superior to all teachings of the Dharma that are based on the continuum of characteristics.

original: sems can bsam pa bzhin du 'dul ba yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: sems can bsam pa bzhin du 'dul ba yang dag par ston pa /
translated: It is the correct teaching that tames beings according to their thoughts.

original: dad pa ji @309b lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba tshim par byed pa /
analyzed: dad pa ji @309b lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba tshim par byed pa /
translated: It satisfies beings according to their faith.

original: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin can ye shes mi zad pa'i yul shin tu non pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin can ye shes mi zad pa'i yul shin tu non pa /
translated: It is the nature of the undifferentiated realm of phenomena, and it is the attainment of the domain of inexhaustible wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos byung ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos byung ba /
translated: It arises through the great power of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid thub pa med pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid thub pa med pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: It is the attainment of the bodhisattvas’ unassailable state of sameness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i yon tan la 'jug pa thams cad kyi mtha'i rjes su 'gro ba rnam par phye ba thams cad la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i yon tan la 'jug pa thams cad kyi mtha'i rjes su 'gro ba rnam par phye ba thams cad la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with the wisdom that is skilled in the knowledge of the extent of all the qualities of seeing the tathāgatas.

original: chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su ston pa /🔽zhing thams cad rnam par dmigs par bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su ston pa / zhing thams cad rnam par dmigs par bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba /
translated: He was the one who taught the Dharma.🔽He was the one who was dedicated to perceiving all realms.

original: zhing dag par bya par dgang ba thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa /
analyzed: zhing dag par bya par dgang ba thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa /
translated: He was the ornament of all the adornments of pure realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa /
translated: He was the one who revealed the light of the Dharma of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyis byung ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyis byung ba /
translated: He was the one who had arisen from the state of a bodhisattva.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang; da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rab tu brjod pa /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang; da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rab tu brjod pa /
translated: He was the one who taught the Dharma of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: 'jig rten thams cad la rnam par lta ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad la rnam par lta ba /
translated: He was the one who looked upon all worlds.

original: dge ba mtha' dang mu med pas yang dag par byung ba /
analyzed: dge ba mtha' dang mu med pas yang dag par byung ba /
translated: He was the one who had arisen from infinite, limitless virtue.

original: 'jig rten gyi rtsom pa thams cad las rnam par 'das pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rtsom pa thams cad las rnam par 'das pa /
translated: He was the one who was beyond all worldly activities.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu byung ba /🔽mtshungs pa med pa dang 'dra ba med pa'i dbang gis shes par gyur pa; mkhas pas khong du chud pa /🔽skyes bu dam pas yang dag par bsu ba /🔽ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'dzin pa /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes @310a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu byung ba / mtshungs pa med pa dang 'dra ba med pa'i dbang gis shes par gyur pa; mkhas pas khong du chud pa / skyes bu dam pas yang dag par bsu ba / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'dzin pa / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes @310a *//
translated: the supramundane, the transcendent,

original: g-yo ba thams cad las yang dag par langs pa /
analyzed: g-yo ba thams cad las yang dag par langs pa /
translated: He was free from all movement.

original: chos la gnas pas ye shes rnam par snang ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos la gnas pas ye shes rnam par snang ba dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with the light of wisdom, abiding in the Dharma.

original: mun pa med pa la zhugs pa /
analyzed: mun pa med pa la zhugs pa /
translated: He had entered the absence of darkness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs pas snang ba thob pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs pas snang ba thob pa /
translated: He had attained the light of having entered all the qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'gags pa med par srid pa thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: 'gags pa med par srid pa thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa /
translated: He was beyond all existence, without obstruction.

original: srid pa thams cad khong du chud pa /
analyzed: srid pa thams cad khong du chud pa /
translated: He had realized all existence.

original: 'dus byas thams cad yul du gyur pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad yul du gyur pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the perfect knowledge of the difference between all conditioned things.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid can /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid can /
translated: He had the nature of being without activity.

original: lus kyi las mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lus kyi las mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had infinite physical actions.

original: ngag gis las mu med pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ngag gis las mu med pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had limitless verbal actions.

original: yid kyi las mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yid kyi las mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had mental actions without end or middle.

original: tha snyad dang yi ge'i rgyud brjod du med pa dang ldan pa; sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
analyzed: tha snyad dang yi ge'i rgyud brjod du med pa dang ldan pa; sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
translated: He was endowed with the inexpressible continuum of words and syllables. He had entered the ocean of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad khong du chud pas chags pa med cing bcings pa med pa /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad khong du chud pas chags pa med cing bcings pa med pa /
translated: He had realized all aspects of perception and was free from attachment and bondage.

original: 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i @310b yul la shin tu bsgoms pa /🔽chos kyi dbyings gzugs med pa /
analyzed: 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i @310b yul la shin tu bsgoms pa / chos kyi dbyings gzugs med pa /
translated: He had meditated on the object that is free from all perceptions.🔽He had arisen from the formless realm of phenomena.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bus yang dag par byung ba /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bus yang dag par byung ba /
translated: He had the nature of space.

original: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rnam par bsgoms pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rnam par bsgoms pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: He had engaged in the meditation that all phenomena are like space.

original: chos kyi dbyings bstan pa la ye shes dbang du gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul ma 'dres pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa stobs bcu'i sar shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings bstan pa la ye shes dbang du gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul ma 'dres pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa stobs bcu'i sar shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs pa /
translated: He had trained in the level of the ten powers, which is the attainment of the gateway to the unshared domain of omniscience, which is the mastery of wisdom in the teaching of the realm of phenomena.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi stegs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi stegs dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the bridge of the wisdom of omniscience.

original: chos thams cad la lhag mthong gi ye shes dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la lhag mthong gi ye shes dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the wisdom of vipaśyanā with regard to all phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos de dang de dag rnam par dgod pa'i don khong du chud par bya ba la ye shes kyi mig gis zhi gnas kyis yang dag par non cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos de dang de dag rnam par dgod pa'i don khong du chud par bya ba la ye shes kyi mig gis zhi gnas kyis yang dag par non cing /
translated: It is the eye of wisdom that penetrates the meaning of the presentation of the various bodhisattva dharmas.

original: ye shes chen po bsgom pas rnam par snang bar gyur pa'i khyad par can gyi smon lam dang ldan pa rab tu ston pa /
analyzed: ye shes chen po bsgom pas rnam par snang bar gyur pa'i khyad par can gyi smon lam dang ldan pa rab tu ston pa /
translated: It is the special aspiration that is illuminated by the cultivation of great wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu tha dad pa med pa ston pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu tha dad pa med pa ston pa ste /
translated: It is the teaching of the non-differentiation of the powers of the tathagatas and all buddhas.

original: de nyid chags pa med pa'i sgo'i tshul lo //
analyzed: de nyid chags pa med pa'i sgo'i tshul lo //
translated: It is the method of the door of non-attachment.

original: de nyid byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'byung ba'o //
translated: It is the origin of many bodhisattvas.

original: de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i mthus thams cad mkhyen pa'i brtson 'grus la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i mthus thams cad mkhyen pa'i brtson 'grus la 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is the engagement in the diligence of omniscience through the power of the bodhisattvas.

original: chags pa med pa la gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhing rnams kyi zhing ngo //🔽sems can med pa'i mtha' la gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chags pa med pa la gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhing rnams kyi zhing ngo // sems can med pa'i mtha' la gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: It is the field of the fields in order to abide in non-attachment.

original: sems can gyi khams rnams 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams rnams 'dul ba'o //
translated: It is the training of the realms of sentient beings in order to abide in the limit of the absence of sentient beings.

original: dmigs pa thams cad mi dmigs par bya ba'i phyir @311a *//
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad mi dmigs par bya ba'i phyir @311a *//
translated: In order to make all objects of perception imperceptible,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: he teaches all the qualities of the Buddha.🔽In order to make all conceptual thoughts imperceptible,

original: rtog pa thams cad las rab tu dben par bya ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa shin tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad las rab tu dben par bya ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa shin tu ston pa'o //
translated: he teaches nonduality.🔽In order to make the nondual imperceptible,

original: gnyis su med pa'i don du mngon par 'du bya ba med pa thams cad kyi mngon par 'du byed pa rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i don du mngon par 'du bya ba med pa thams cad kyi mngon par 'du byed pa rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: he teaches the activity of all that is unconditioned.🔽He teaches the self-nature of all the buddhas,🔽in order to teach the enumeration of forms, even though forms are imperceptible,

original: gzugs su dmigs pa med kyang gzugs kyi grangs su bstan pa dang / tshor ba'i yul med kyang tshor ba'i yul du brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid ched du brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs su dmigs pa med kyang gzugs kyi grangs su bstan pa dang / tshor ba'i yul med kyang tshor ba'i yul du brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid ched du brjod pa'o //
translated: and in order to teach the object of sensation, even though the object of sensation does not exist.

original: phyin ci log thams cad kyang byang la /
analyzed: phyin ci log thams cad kyang byang la /
translated: He teaches all errors,

original: 'du shes kyi gnas thams cad kyang yongs su ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi gnas thams cad kyang yongs su ston pa'o //
translated: and he teaches all the bases of perception.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med par yang ston la /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med par yang ston la /
translated: He teaches the unconditioned,

original: 'du byed thams cad kyang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad kyang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: and he teaches all conditioned things.

original: 'du byed thams cad kyang rnam par mi dmigs la /
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad kyang rnam par mi dmigs la /
translated: They do not apprehend any composite things,

original: chos thams cad rnam par shes par yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par shes par yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: and they teach that all phenomena are consciousness.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo yang byin gyis rlob la /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo yang byin gyis rlob la /
translated: They bless the wheel of the Dharma,

original: chos thams cad brjod du med par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad brjod du med par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: and they teach that all phenomena are inexpressible.

original: chos thams cad la'ang rgyu ba med la /
analyzed: chos thams cad la'ang rgyu ba med la /
translated: They do not engage with any phenomena,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo yang shin tu bskor ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo yang shin tu bskor ba'o //
translated: and they turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos thams cad la'ang rnam pa tha dad pa med la /
analyzed: chos thams cad la'ang rnam pa tha dad pa med la /
translated: They do not differentiate any phenomena,

original: rnam par dbye ba yang yongs su ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba yang yongs su ston pa'o //
translated: and they teach the distinctions.

original: chos thams cad la skye ba med par yang ston la /
analyzed: chos thams cad la skye ba med par yang ston la /
translated: They teach that all phenomena are unborn,

original: gzugs rnams 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid du'ang brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs rnams 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid du'ang brjod pa'o //
translated: and they describe forms as having the characteristic of destruction.

original: chos thams cad shin tu phra bar @311b yang khong du chud la /
analyzed: chos thams cad shin tu phra bar @311b yang khong du chud la /
translated: They understand all phenomena to be subtle,

original: phra ba rnams shin tu yangs par yang ston pa'o //
analyzed: phra ba rnams shin tu yangs par yang ston pa'o //
translated: and they teach that the subtle is vast.

original: bla na med pa'i chos kyang sbyin par byed la /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i chos kyang sbyin par byed la /
translated: They give the unsurpassed Dharma,

original: gong ma'i go 'phang shes par bya ba'ang rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: gong ma'i go 'phang shes par bya ba'ang rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: and they teach the understanding of higher states.

original: chos thams cad brjod du med par yang brjod pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad brjod du med par yang brjod pa /
translated: He teaches that all phenomena are inexpressible,

original: brjod pa'i tshig dang yi ge'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yang rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa'i tshig dang yi ge'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yang rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: and he teaches the pure ornamentation of words and letters.

original: phyi dang nang gi chos med par bstan pa la'ang shin tu mkhas la /
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi chos med par bstan pa la'ang shin tu mkhas la /
translated: He is skilled in teaching that there are no outer or inner phenomena,

original: chos thams cad sems med cing btags pa'i rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du'ang rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad sems med cing btags pa'i rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du'ang rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: and he teaches that all phenomena are without mind and are imputed continuums.

original: yongs su 'grub pa tshad med pas 'byung ba yang khong du chud la /
analyzed: yongs su 'grub pa tshad med pas 'byung ba yang khong du chud la /
translated: He understands the arising of phenomena through immeasurable accomplishment,

original: byang ba'i mthar phyin pas chos thams cad zag pa zad par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: byang ba'i mthar phyin pas chos thams cad zag pa zad par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: and he teaches that all phenomena are the exhaustion of defilements through the perfection of purification.

original: chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par yang khong du chud la /
analyzed: chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par yang khong du chud la /
translated: He understands that all phenomena are without afflictions,
