original: rang 'byung gi 'du shes kyang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rang 'byung gi 'du shes kyang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: and he teaches the perception of self-arising.

original: chos thams cad la slob dpon med par yang shin tu ston la /
analyzed: chos thams cad la slob dpon med par yang shin tu ston la /
translated: He teaches that all phenomena are without a master,

original: bla ma la brten cing sten par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma la brten cing sten par yang rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: and he teaches that one should rely on and serve a guru.

original: chos thams cad gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par yang shes la /
analyzed: chos thams cad gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par yang shes la /
translated: They know all phenomena to be independent of others,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod yul yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod yul yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: and they also proclaim the domain of spiritual teachers.

original: chos thams cad rgyu ba med par yang brjod la /
analyzed: chos thams cad rgyu ba med par yang brjod la /
translated: They proclaim all phenomena to be without movement,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang shin tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang shin tu ston pa'o //
translated: and they also demonstrate the turning of the wheel of Dharma.

original: chos thams cad 'byung ba med par yang rab tu shes la /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'byung ba med par yang rab tu shes la /
translated: They know all phenomena to be without origination,

original: rgyu las 'byung ba'ang yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu las 'byung ba'ang yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
translated: and they do not abandon the arising of causes.

original: chos thams cad thog ma med par yang rab tu brjod la /
analyzed: chos thams cad thog ma med par yang rab tu brjod la /
translated: They proclaim all phenomena to be without beginning,

original: sngon gyi mtha'i mu yang rab tu sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha'i mu yang rab tu sbyong ba'o //
translated: and they also purify the limit of the past.

original: chos @312a *// thams cad 'ong ba med par yang khong du chud la /
analyzed: chos @312a *// thams cad 'ong ba med par yang khong du chud la /
translated: They understand all phenomena to be without coming,

original: 'ong ba'i mtha' yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'ong ba'i mtha' yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: and they also proclaim the limit of coming.

original: chos thams cad ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba med par yang rab tu ston la /
analyzed: chos thams cad ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba med par yang rab tu ston la /
translated: They demonstrate all phenomena to be without the future and the present,

original: da ltar byung bar yang shin tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung bar yang shin tu ston pa'o //
translated: and they also demonstrate the present.

original: bya ba med pa'i lam yang yongs su brjod la /
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i lam yang yongs su brjod la /
translated: They proclaim the path of inaction,🔽and they also demonstrate the path of action.

original: bya ba'i lam yang shin tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i lam yang shin tu ston pa'o //
translated: He also teaches the path of action.

original: chos thams cad rgyu med par yang rab tu shes la /
analyzed: chos thams cad rgyu med par yang rab tu shes la /
translated: He knows all phenomena to be without cause,

original: rgyu bsags par yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu bsags par yang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: but he also describes the accumulation of causes.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa med par yang ston la /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa med par yang ston la /
translated: He teaches all phenomena to be without equality,

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi lam gyi lam gol ba'ang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi lam gyi lam gol ba'ang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: but he also describes the path of equality and the wrong paths.

original: chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral bar yang ston la /
analyzed: chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral bar yang ston la /
translated: He teaches all phenomena to be free from the path of words,

original: dus gsum shin tu bstan pa'ang shin tu rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum shin tu bstan pa'ang shin tu rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: but he also causes the three times to be well known.

original: chos thams cad gnas pa med par yang ston la /
analyzed: chos thams cad gnas pa med par yang ston la /
translated: He teaches all phenomena to be without abode,

original: gnas shin tu gzhom pa la rab tu mkhas pa'o //🔽chos thams cad lus med kyang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku yang rab tu thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gnas shin tu gzhom pa la rab tu mkhas pa'o // chos thams cad lus med kyang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku yang rab tu thob par byed pa'o //
translated: but he is also skilled in the destruction of abodes.🔽He teaches all phenomena to be without body,🔽but he also causes the attainment of the bodies of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shin tu ston la /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shin tu ston la /
translated: He also teaches all the buddhas of the past, present, and future,

original: sangs rgyas gcig par bstan pa yang rab tu ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gcig par bstan pa yang rab tu ston to //
translated: and they reveal the teaching of the single Buddha.

original: chos thams cad la brjod pa med par yang khong du chud la /
analyzed: chos thams cad la brjod pa med par yang khong du chud la /
translated: They understand all phenomena to be inexpressible,

original: chos thams cad yongs su brjod pa'ang rab tu ston to //
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su brjod pa'ang rab tu ston to //
translated: and they reveal the teaching of all phenomena.

original: chos @312b thams cad bltar med par yang ston la /
analyzed: chos @312b thams cad bltar med par yang ston la /
translated: They reveal all phenomena to be invisible,

original: lta ba'ang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba'ang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: and they reveal the teaching of views.

original: chos thams cad la mtha' med par yang ston la /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mtha' med par yang ston la /
translated: They reveal all phenomena to be boundless,

original: chos bstan pa'i rnam pas kyang rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: chos bstan pa'i rnam pas kyang rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: and they reveal the teaching of the phenomena that are taught.🔽They reveal all phenomena to be without an object,

original: chos thams cad la yul med kyang ye shes kyi yul du rab tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la yul med kyang ye shes kyi yul du rab tu brjod pa'o //
translated: and they reveal the object of wisdom.🔽They reveal the teaching of all phenomena to be without distinction,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad khyad par med kyang 'bras bu'i khyad par rnam par sbyang ba rab tu ston pa'o; ;chos thams cad la 'byung ba med kyang spyod pas 'byung ba'i khyad par rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad khyad par med kyang 'bras bu'i khyad par rnam par sbyang ba rab tu ston pa'o; ;chos thams cad la 'byung ba med kyang spyod pas 'byung ba'i khyad par rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: and they reveal the purification of the distinction of results. They reveal the arising of all phenomena to be without origination,🔽and they reveal the distinction of the arising of conduct.🔽They reveal all phenomena to be all-pervading,

original: chos thams cad kun tu khyab pa yin yang mdos yongs su brjod pa shin tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kun tu khyab pa yin yang mdos yongs su brjod pa shin tu ston pa'o //
translated: and they reveal the teaching of the ultimate.

original: chos thams cad la snang ba med kyang snang ba yongs su brjod pa'i phyir rnam par snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la snang ba med kyang snang ba yongs su brjod pa'i phyir rnam par snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: And even though all phenomena are without appearance, they are the illuminators because they express appearance.

original: de ltar rgya che ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jug go /🔽khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar rgya che ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jug go / khong du chud par byed do //
translated: In this way, bodhisattvas enter the great maṇḍala of the gnosis of the vast samādhi.🔽They understand it.

original: thob par byed do //
analyzed: thob par byed do //
translated: They attain it.

original: rjes su snyegs par byed do //🔽shin tu sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: rjes su snyegs par byed do // shin tu sgrub par byed do //
translated: They follow it.🔽They accomplish it.

original: yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect it.

original: shin tu gsog go /🔽yongs su sbyong ngo //
analyzed: shin tu gsog go / yongs su sbyong ngo //
translated: They accumulate it.🔽They purify it.

original: snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: They rest in equipoise.

original: chos thams cad de'i chos nyid dang / rang bzhin dang / ye shes kyi snying po'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos khong du chud par byed kyang /
analyzed: chos thams cad de'i chos nyid dang / rang bzhin dang / ye shes kyi snying po'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos khong du chud par byed kyang /
translated: They understand the Dharma of all buddhas through the principle of the essence of the nature and the wisdom of all phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'di snyam du mi sems te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'di snyam du mi sems te /
translated: However, the bodhisattva does not think in this way:

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyed gcig go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyed gcig go /
translated: ‘There are this many bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di snyed gcig go /🔽byang chub @313a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di snyed gcig go / byang chub @313a *//
translated: “There are this many bodhisattva qualities.

original: sems dpa'i mthar thug pa ni 'di tsam zhig go /
analyzed: sems dpa'i mthar thug pa ni 'di tsam zhig go /
translated: “This is the extent of the bodhisattva’s culmination.

original: sprul pa'i byin gyis rlabs ni 'di tsam zhig go /🔽mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa ni 'di snyed cig go /
analyzed: sprul pa'i byin gyis rlabs ni 'di tsam zhig go / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa ni 'di snyed cig go /
translated: “This is the extent of the bodhisattva’s magical emanations.🔽“This is the extent of the bodhisattva’s superknowledges.

original: ye shes ni 'di tsam zhig go /🔽nges par rtogs par bya ba ni 'di tsam zhig go /
analyzed: ye shes ni 'di tsam zhig go / nges par rtogs par bya ba ni 'di tsam zhig go /
translated: “This is the extent of the bodhisattva’s wisdom.🔽“This is the extent of the bodhisattva’s realization.

original: rjes su snyegs pa ni 'di tsam zhig go /🔽'jug par bya ba ni 'di tsam zhig go /
analyzed: rjes su snyegs pa ni 'di tsam zhig go / 'jug par bya ba ni 'di tsam zhig go /
translated: “This is the extent of the bodhisattva’s pursuit.🔽“This is the extent of the bodhisattva’s engagement.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i yul ni 'di tsam zhig go snyam du sems pa med do ////🔽bam po lnga bcu dgu pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i yul ni 'di tsam zhig go snyam du sems pa med do //// bam po lnga bcu dgu pa /
translated: “This is the extent of the bodhisattva’s domain.”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rnam pa de lta bu ste; de ltar tshad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rnam pa de lta bu ste; de ltar tshad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Why is that?🔽Because the bodhisattvas’ samādhis are like that, immeasurable.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni de lta bu'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni de lta bu'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The bodhisattvas’ samādhis have such special qualities.

original: de dag ni gzhan dang gzhan gyis bskyed pa /
analyzed: de dag ni gzhan dang gzhan gyis bskyed pa /
translated: They were produced by one thing after another.

original: gzhan dang gzhan du byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan du byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: They were empowered by one thing after another.

original: gzhan dang gzhan du rgyu ba /
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan du rgyu ba /
translated: They moved from one thing to another.

original: chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo can ye shes kyi sgo brjod du med pa /
analyzed: chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo can ye shes kyi sgo brjod du med pa /
translated: They had the door of various Dharmas, the door of inexpressible wisdom.

original: blos rnam par brtag cing rnam pa dbye bas khyad par gyi mtha' med pa nges par rtogs pa grangs med pas khong du chud pa /
analyzed: blos rnam par brtag cing rnam pa dbye bas khyad par gyi mtha' med pa nges par rtogs pa grangs med pas khong du chud pa /
translated: They were understood by the realization of countless distinctions that were analyzed and differentiated by the mind.

original: ye shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas rgya che ba /
analyzed: ye shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas rgya che ba /
translated: They were vast with inexpressible quintillions of wisdoms.

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba sna tshogs kyi mdzod du gyur pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba sna tshogs kyi mdzod du gyur pas /
translated: They were the treasury of various visions of buddhas.

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa mos pas rnam par dag pa /🔽dbang po shin tu yangs pa /
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa mos pas rnam par dag pa / dbang po shin tu yangs pa /
translated: They were pure with devotion that was without end or middle.🔽They had very vast faculties.

original: mngon par shes pa rab tu rno ba /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rab tu rno ba /
translated: They had very sharp higher perceptions.

original: bsags pa med pa'i spyod yul can /
analyzed: bsags pa med pa'i spyod yul can /
translated: They had a field of activity that was not accumulated.

original: kun @313b tu lta bas rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: kun @313b tu lta bas rab tu thob pa /
translated: They were attained by looking everywhere.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad lta bas grub pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad lta bas grub pa /
translated: They were accomplished by seeing all buddhas.

original: kun tu bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa /
translated: They were accomplished by the superior intention of Samantabhadra.

original: ye shes kyi rgyal po'i sku las byung ba /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rgyal po'i sku las byung ba /
translated: it arose from the body of the king of pristine consciousnesses;

original: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i ye shes tshad med pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam par phye ba mtha' dang dbus med pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i ye shes tshad med pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam par phye ba mtha' dang dbus med pa /
translated: it was the display of the display of the boundless pristine consciousness taught by the tathāgatas;

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes zad mi shes pa las gol ba med pa'i sgo can; sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes zad mi shes pa las gol ba med pa'i sgo can; sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa /
translated: it was the gateway that never deviated from the inexhaustible pristine consciousness of all buddhas;

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas rnam par spyang ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas rnam par spyang ba /
translated: it was purified by the power of the bull of pristine consciousness of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra;

original: sgo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu skyes pas dpe med par brjod pa /🔽dmigs pa shin tu phra bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba /
analyzed: sgo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu skyes pas dpe med par brjod pa / dmigs pa shin tu phra bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba /
translated: it was beyond analogy, having been born from the maṇḍala of all gateways;🔽it was the correct engagement with the entire realm of phenomena through subtle observation;

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par dmigs pa shin tu phra bar byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par dmigs pa shin tu phra bar byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: it was the blessing of the entire realm of phenomena through subtle observation;

original: 'phags par gsung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pas shin tu snang bar byas pa /
analyzed: 'phags par gsung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pas shin tu snang bar byas pa /
translated: it was the illumination of the omniscience of the noble ones;

original: dbang gi dmigs pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa; chos kyi sgo thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa can /
analyzed: dbang gi dmigs pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa; chos kyi sgo thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa can /
translated: They had accomplished all the visualizations for empowerment. They had the knowledge of the distinctions of the culmination of all the doors of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the body of wisdom that pervades the realm of phenomena.

original: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyis grub pa /
analyzed: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyis grub pa /
translated: They had accomplished the path that goes everywhere.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad mkhas par khong du chud pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad mkhas par khong du chud pa /
translated: They had mastered all samādhis.

original: sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag ste /🔽sems skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa' @314a *//
analyzed: sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag ste / sems skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa' @314a *//
translated: Their minds were blessed by all buddhas.

original: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la gnas te /
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la gnas te /
translated: In each instant of mind they were abiding in the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba phrag brgya la snyoms par zhugs kyang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba phrag brgya la snyoms par zhugs kyang /
translated: They were absorbed in a quintillion samādhis that were beyond description.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang yul gyi rgyan gyi snang bas yongs su snang bar bya ba rnams kyis mtha' dmigs par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang yul gyi rgyan gyi snang bas yongs su snang bar bya ba rnams kyis mtha' dmigs par mi rung ngo //
translated: However, the display of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra’s samādhis and the display of his field were beyond the scope of perception.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: chos thams cad ni byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa ste /
translated: All dharmas are blessed by the blessing of the buddhas.

original: thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: They should all be understood.

original: zhing rnams ni mu med pa ste /
analyzed: zhing rnams ni mu med pa ste /
translated: The realms are limitless.

original: thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: They should all be understood.

original: sems can gyi khams thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
translated: The realms of sentient beings are inconceivable.

original: de dag ni rdo rje'i tshig khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag ni rdo rje'i tshig khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: They should be understood with vajra words.

original: de dag gis khyad par thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gis khyad par thams cad kyang khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: All their differences should be understood.

original: sngon gyi mtha' ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
translated: The past has no beginning or end.

original: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: They should all be understood.

original: phyi ma'i mtha' ni mu med pa ste /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' ni mu med pa ste /
translated: The future has no limit.

original: de dag kyang lhag ma ma lus par khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang lhag ma ma lus par khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: They should be understood without remainder.

original: da ltar byung ba'i dus ni mtha' dang dbus med pa ste /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i dus ni mtha' dang dbus med pa ste /
translated: The present time has no middle or end.

original: nam mkha' dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: It is as vast as the realm of space.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa ste /
translated: the realm of the Dharma,

original: de yang ma lus par khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang ma lus par khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: and all of them without exception.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul te /
translated: The domain of the buddhas is an inconceivable domain,

original: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: and all of them are to be understood.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni grangs med pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni grangs med pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattva activities are innumerable,

original: de dag kyang thams cad @314b khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang thams cad @314b khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: and all of them are to be understood.

original: sangs rgyas kyis thugs su chud pa dang dgongs pa ni yul mtha' yas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis thugs su chud pa dang dgongs pa ni yul mtha' yas pa /
translated: The understanding and intention of the buddhas are infinite domains,

original: yul brjod du med pa ste /
analyzed: yul brjod du med pa ste /
translated: inexpressible domains,

original: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: and all of them are to be understood.

original: chos su dmigs pa thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos su dmigs pa thams cad ni /
translated: All phenomena are observed

original: sems kyi rang bzhin mthar phyin pa med pa ste /
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin mthar phyin pa med pa ste /
translated: to be the nature of the mind, which is without end,

original: de dag kyang thams cad lhag ma med par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang thams cad lhag ma med par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: and all of them are to be understood without exception.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / yid bzhin gyi nor bu las ni ji bsam pa thams cad 'byung yang de snyed du mngon par 'du byed pas stongs par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dper na / yid bzhin gyi nor bu las ni ji bsam pa thams cad 'byung yang de snyed du mngon par 'du byed pas stongs par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: For example, a wish-fulfilling jewel can produce everything that is wished for, but it is not exhausted by doing so.

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur yang rgyun chad pa med do //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur yang rgyun chad pa med do //
translated: It fulfills all wishes without interruption.

original: zad par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: zad par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: It is never exhausted.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu de yang rgyun gcod par sems pa med do //
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu de yang rgyun gcod par sems pa med do //
translated: The wish-fulfilling jewel does not think, ‘I will stop producing things.’

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems sgyu ma lta bu la zhugs pas /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems sgyu ma lta bu la zhugs pas /
translated: In the same way, a bodhisattva who has entered into the illusion-like nature of mind

original: chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub kyang mthar phyin pa'i sems mi skyed de /
analyzed: chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub kyang mthar phyin pa'i sems mi skyed de /
translated: accomplishes all the objects of the Dharma, but does not think, ‘I have finished.’🔽He does not stop the continuity of those samādhis.

original: ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag gi rgyun yongs su mi gcod do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag gi rgyun yongs su mi gcod do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba tshad med pa la zhugs pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba tshad med pa la zhugs pas /
translated: Because the bodhisattva has entered into the immeasurable, vast, and extensive maṇḍala of illusion.

original: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa don yod pa /
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa don yod pa /
translated: He has the meaningful conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: nges par rtogs pa la gnas pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang ldan pas de la rgyas par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: nges par rtogs pa la gnas pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang ldan pas de la rgyas par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: They are endowed with the door of the pristine awareness that is the realization of the accomplishment of the state of abiding in certain realization.🔽

original: 'bri bar 'gyur ba med do //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'bri bar 'gyur ba med do // 'di lta ste /
translated: He is not diminished by the increase of the wisdom that is the realization of the stages and the realization of the accomplishments.

original: @315a *// dper na /🔽byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni /
analyzed: @315a *// dper na / byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni /
translated: For example,

original: sems kyi sgo mu med pa ste /
analyzed: sems kyi sgo mu med pa ste /
translated: the minds of ordinary, foolish people are endless.

original: de dag gi sems ni ma skyes /
analyzed: de dag gi sems ni ma skyes /
translated: Their minds are unborn,🔽not born, and will not be born.

original: mi skye / skye bar mi 'gyur ba yin yang de dag gi sems skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba'am /🔽skyes pa mtha' med pa ste /
analyzed: mi skye / skye bar mi 'gyur ba yin yang de dag gi sems skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba'am / skyes pa mtha' med pa ste /
translated: But their minds are born, will be born, and are being born.🔽They are endless,

original: thug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: thug pa med pa'o //
translated: without limit,

original: zad par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zad par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: inexhaustible,

original: sems kyi rgyud yongs su rgyun chad pa med de /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud yongs su rgyun chad pa med de /
translated: and their mental continuum is uninterrupted.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: They are inconceivable.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa sgyu ma'i sgo mang po kun dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa sgyu ma'i sgo mang po kun dang ldan pa /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattvas, who are endowed with the many aspects of the illusory gate of samādhi,

original: 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa la'ang mur thug pa med do //
analyzed: 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa la'ang mur thug pa med do //
translated: enter into this samādhi without limit.

original: tshad kyis gcal ba med do //
analyzed: tshad kyis gcal ba med do //
translated: There is no way to measure it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de snyed du tshad med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi sgo khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de snyed du tshad med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi sgo khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the bodhisattva Samantabhadra has comprehended that many ways of the Dharma that are beyond measure.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de ma yin pa dag gis char phab na /
analyzed: dper na / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de ma yin pa dag gis char phab na /
translated: When the nāga kings Sāgara, Nanda, Upananda, and Manomaya, and other great nāga kings, send down rain,

original: char pa'i thigs pa re re zhing /
analyzed: char pa'i thigs pa re re zhing /
translated: each drop of rain

original: ba ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam gyi rgyun du phab kyang char pa de la zad ces bya ba med do //
analyzed: ba ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam gyi rgyun du phab kyang char pa de la zad ces bya ba med do //
translated: falls like a stream the size of a jujube fruit, and that rain is not exhausted.

original: sngar bab pa de nyid phyir 'bab ces bya ba med do //
analyzed: sngar bab pa de nyid phyir 'bab ces bya ba med do //
translated: It is not the case that the rain that has fallen before is falling again.

original: sprin gyi mngon par 'du bya ba la zad ces bya ba med do //
analyzed: sprin gyi mngon par 'du bya ba la zad ces bya ba med do //
translated: The activity of the clouds is not exhausted.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas lta ba'i sgo @315b dang; phyogs su 'gro ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi dbang gi rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas lta ba'i sgo @315b dang; phyogs su 'gro ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi dbang gi rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo dang /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva Samantabhadra has the gateway of samādhi, the gateway of wisdom, the gateway of Dharma, the gateway of seeing the buddhas, the gateway of going to the directions, the gateway of following the power of mind,

original: byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / cho 'phrul gyi sgo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / cho 'phrul gyi sgo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang /
translated: the gateway of blessings, the gateway of miracles, the gateway of emanations, the gateway of the way of nirvāṇa, the gateway of the way of the Dharma, and the gateway of perfecting the ocean of the inexpressibly inexpressible assemblies of bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i drung du 'gro ba'i sgo dang / dbang po'i dra ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i drung du 'gro ba'i sgo dang / dbang po'i dra ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /
translated: the gateway to going into the presence of as many thus-gone ones as there are atoms in an inexpressible number of inexpressibly vast buddha realms,🔽the gateway to entering and comprehending an inexpressible number of inexpressibly vast nets of sense faculties,🔽the gateway to comprehending the extent of the different world systems with an inexpressible number of inexpressibly vast minds,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud tha dad pa'i bye brag brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems kyi tshad kyis khong du chud par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dngos po yod pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud tha dad pa'i bye brag brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems kyi tshad kyis khong du chud par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dngos po yod pa dang /
translated: and the gateway to the infinite buddha realms and the existent world systems.

original: dngos po med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / rjes su bsnyegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang / dus rnam pa tha dad cing bskal pa mi mthun pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / rjes su bsnyegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang / dus rnam pa tha dad cing bskal pa mi mthun pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
translated: the gateway of the inexpressible and beyond the inexpressible, which is the comprehension of the different times and dissimilar eons;🔽the gateway of the inexpressible and beyond the inexpressible, which is the teaching;

original: bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa brjod du med pa'i yang @316a *//
analyzed: bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa brjod du med pa'i yang @316a *//
translated: and the gateway of the inexpressible and beyond the inexpressible, which is the origination and destruction of the continuum of world systems.

original: brjod du med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas khong du chud pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing spyi'u tshugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / snrel zhir rgyu ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu sems kyi skad cig gcig gis byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i sgo la mtha' med do; ;zad pa med do //🔽sa mtshams med do //
analyzed: brjod du med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas khong du chud pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing spyi'u tshugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / snrel zhir rgyu ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu sems kyi skad cig gcig gis byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i sgo la mtha' med do; ;zad pa med do // sa mtshams med do //
translated: The gateway to realization through knowing the inexpressible just as it is, and the gateway to enlightenment in a single instant in the buddha realms that are inexpressibly inexpressible and the inexpressibly inexpressible realms that are arranged in a crisscross pattern, are limitless.🔽They are endless.

original: mu med do //🔽skyo ba med do //
analyzed: mu med do // skyo ba med do //
translated: They are boundless.🔽They are inexhaustible.🔽They are not to be lamented.

original: yongs su yi 'chad pa med do //🔽thug pa med do //
analyzed: yongs su yi 'chad pa med do // thug pa med do //
translated: They are not to be despaired of.🔽They are not to be exhausted.

original: rgyun 'chad pa med do //🔽phyir ldog pa med do //
analyzed: rgyun 'chad pa med do // phyir ldog pa med do //
translated: They are not to be interrupted.🔽They are not to be turned back.

original: chud za ba med do //
analyzed: chud za ba med do //
translated: They are not to be lost.

original: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi sgos thug pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi sgos thug pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: However, the bodhisattvas do not reach the end of the gateway of phenomena.

original: nges par rtogs par bya bas yongs su yi 'chad par 'gyur ba med do; ;thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo zad par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: nges par rtogs par bya bas yongs su yi 'chad par 'gyur ba med do; ;thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo zad par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He never ceases to open the door to omniscience.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba las phyir ldog pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba las phyir ldog pa med do //
translated: He never turns back from illuminating all the world systems in the vast reaches of the universes.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu bskor ba la btang snyoms su byed pa med do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu bskor ba la btang snyoms su byed pa med do //
translated: He never ceases to turn the wheel of Dharma, which is inexpressible and beyond words.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yongs su dri ba la zad par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yongs su dri ba la zad par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He never ceases to ask questions about the Buddha’s wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub blta ba la mthar thug pa med do //🔽sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul bar bya ba yongs su gtong ba med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub blta ba la mthar thug pa med do // sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul bar bya ba yongs su gtong ba med do //
translated: He never reaches the end of seeing the Buddha’s enlightenment.🔽He never gives up on guiding all beings.

original: kun tu @316b bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis 'byung ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: kun tu @316b bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis 'byung ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: He never ceases to manifest the conduct and aspirations of Samantabhadra.

original: kha dog mtha' yas pa'i lus tshad med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pas sa mtshams su 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: kha dog mtha' yas pa'i lus tshad med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pas sa mtshams su 'gyur ba med do //
translated: The infinite colors, the infinite bodies, the infinite displays are not limited by boundaries.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / me ni ji srid du shing yod pa de srid du 'bar te /
analyzed: dper na / me ni ji srid du shing yod pa de srid du 'bar te /
translated: Fire burns as long as there is fuel.

original: me 'bar ba la mthar thug pa med do //
analyzed: me 'bar ba la mthar thug pa med do //
translated: The burning of fire is not limited.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ji tsam du sems can gyi khams la rnam par dpyod pa dang / ji tsam du chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / ji tsam du nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi tshad mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ji tsam du sems can gyi khams la rnam par dpyod pa dang / ji tsam du chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / ji tsam du nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi tshad mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattvas analyze the realm of sentient beings, they enter the realm of phenomena, they move through the world systems, and they do not apprehend the extent of the nature of space.

original: ji tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
analyzed: ji tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
translated: They enter into and comprehend the succession of buddha realms, as numerous as the atoms in an anabhilāpyānabhilāpya­parivarta of buddha realms, in every instant of mind.

original: ji tsam du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag gi /
analyzed: ji tsam du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag gi /
translated: They enter into the distinctions of the Dharma in the infinite buddha realms of the knowledge of omniscience, which are anabhilāpyānabhilāpya­parivarta in number.

original: chos kyi bye brag rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa dang / ji tsam du sems can gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzhog cing nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang / nye bar rton pa dang /
analyzed: chos kyi bye brag rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa dang / ji tsam du sems can gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzhog cing nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang / nye bar rton pa dang /
translated: They establish, support, and purify the roots of virtue of the anabhilāpyānabhilāpya­parivarta of beings in the realms of beings.

original: shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa dang / ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba @317a *//
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa dang / ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba @317a *//
translated: They purify the roots of virtue of bodhisattvas.

original: dam pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par mthong zhing /🔽smon lam gcig tu nges pa med pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam la nges par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul gyi ye shes kyi sgo la gzhog pa dang / ji tsam du dus gsum la 'jug pa'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byams klas pa dang /
analyzed: dam pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par mthong zhing / smon lam gcig tu nges pa med pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam la nges par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul gyi ye shes kyi sgo la gzhog pa dang / ji tsam du dus gsum la 'jug pa'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byams klas pa dang /
translated: They see the utterly inexpressible and utterly beyond the inexpressible.🔽They are introduced to the conduct and aspirations of Samantabhadra, which are not fixed on a single aspiration, and they are introduced to the gateway of wisdom that is the domain of Samantabhadra. They are introduced to the inexpressible and utterly beyond the inexpressible continuum that is the extent of the three times.🔽They are introduced to the extent of the three times in a way that is without center or edge, by engaging with the time of equipoise and conceptualization. They are introduced to the extent of the wisdom object, which is the arising and unceasing movement of the conceptual reference points of the inexpressible and utterly beyond the inexpressible arising,

original: snyoms shing rnam par rtog pa'i dus la 'jug pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshul du 'jug pa dang / ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba dang; 'jig pa dang / gnas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par rtog pa'i dmigs pa kun tu rgyu ba 'byung zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi dmigs pa /🔽snying rje chen po las byung ba /
analyzed: snyoms shing rnam par rtog pa'i dus la 'jug pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshul du 'jug pa dang / ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba dang; 'jig pa dang / gnas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par rtog pa'i dmigs pa kun tu rgyu ba 'byung zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi dmigs pa /🔽snying rje chen po las byung ba /
translated: destroying, and remaining of world systems.

original: smon lam chen pos sprul pa /
analyzed: smon lam chen pos sprul pa /
translated: emanations through great prayers,

original: 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par 'dul ba la brtson pa yang mthar thug ces bya ba med do //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par 'dul ba la brtson pa yang mthar thug ces bya ba med do //
translated: and the effort to tame all beings without exception.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Because in order to perfect the conduct and prayers of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par ye shes kyis bsgrubs pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par ye shes kyis bsgrubs pas /
translated: the bodhisattva Samantabhadra’s conduct is accomplished through wisdom,

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba la brtson pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba la brtson pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and he is dedicated to liberating all beings.”

original: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin @317b gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / de lta bu'i yul de ltar rgya che ba dang / de ltar yangs pa dang / de ltar tshad med pa dang / de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
analyzed: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin @317b gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / de lta bu'i yul de ltar rgya che ba dang / de ltar yangs pa dang / de ltar tshad med pa dang / de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
translated: “Therefore, bodhisattvas, this kind of samādhi, this kind of object, is so vast, so expansive, so immeasurable, so inconceivable,

original: de ltar 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur pa dang / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su grub pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur pa dang / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su grub pa dang /
translated: In this way, one should be intent on the infinite light, the presence of all the buddhas, the blessing of all the tathāgatas, the accomplishment of all the roots of virtue,

original: de ltar mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
translated: and the unshakable mind.

original: yongs su yi 'chad pa med pas brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su yi 'chad pa med pas brtan par bya'o //
translated: One should be firm through being without regret.

original: skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish it with an undaunted mind.

original: bsam pa phyir mi ldog pa bskyed par bya'o //🔽gdon mi za bar 'byung bas sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsam pa phyir mi ldog pa bskyed par bya'o // gdon mi za bar 'byung bas sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should generate an irreversible intention.🔽One should apply oneself through inevitable occurrence.

original: rtsom pa'i nan tan gyis mthun par spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: rtsom pa'i nan tan gyis mthun par spyad par bya'o //
translated: One should practice in accordance with the earnest practice of undertaking.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes yongs su gnon par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes yongs su gnon par bya'o //
translated: One should master inconceivable wisdom.

original: sgyu'i sa la mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: sgyu'i sa la mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o //
translated: One should be without attachment to the stage of deception.

original: 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mi gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mi gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should not dwell on any worldly object.

original: chos thams cad la chags pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la chags pa med par bya'o //
translated: One should be free from attachment to all phenomena.

original: rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bsal bar bya'o //🔽dngos po thams cad la chags pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bsal bar bya'o // dngos po thams cad la chags pa med par bya'o //
translated: One should eliminate all conceit.🔽One should be free from attachment to all things.

original: dmigs pa thams cad la rtog pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad la rtog pa med par bya'o //
translated: One should be free from conceptualization regarding all objects.

original: chos khong du chud par bya ba la tshod 'dzin pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: chos khong du chud par bya ba la tshod 'dzin pa med par bya'o //
translated: One should not limit one’s understanding of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi ye shes rtogs par khong du chud par bya'o //🔽thams cad mkhyen pa'i gdan @318a *//
analyzed: chos kyi ye shes rtogs par khong du chud par bya'o // thams cad mkhyen pa'i gdan @318a *//
translated: One should understand the realization of the wisdom of the Dharma.🔽One should not be confused about the seat of omniscience,

original: la sangs rgyas su byang chub pas rmongs pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: la sangs rgyas su byang chub pas rmongs pa med par bya'o //
translated: which is the enlightenment of a buddha.

original: chos kyi snang ba yongs su bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi snang ba yongs su bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish the light of the Dharma.

original: 'gro ba thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdu par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdu par bya'o //
translated: One should gather all beings through roots of virtue.

original: bdud kyi yul las sems can yongs su bskyod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi yul las sems can yongs su bskyod par bya'o //
translated: One should shake beings out of the domain of Māra.

original: chos kyi yul la sems can rab tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi yul la sems can rab tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: One should establish beings in the domain of the Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gzud par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gzud par bya'o //
translated: One should introduce beings to the domain of the buddhas.

original: smon lam gyi yul las phyir ldog pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: smon lam gyi yul las phyir ldog pa med par bya'o //
translated: I will not turn away from the field of aspiration.

original: 'byung ba'i yul la rtogs pas gzhag par bya'o //🔽rnam par dag pa'i yul la rab tu zhen par bya'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i yul la rtogs pas gzhag par bya'o // rnam par dag pa'i yul la rab tu zhen par bya'o //
translated: I will be established in the field of appearance through realization.🔽I will be attached to the field of purity.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: I will comprehend the field of the perfections.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu mos par bya'o //🔽chos thams cad la dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid du yang dag par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu mos par bya'o // chos thams cad la dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid du yang dag par 'jug par bya'o //
translated: I will have great interest in all the buddhas.🔽I will engage with the nature of all phenomena as being insubstantial.

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: I will comprehend that all phenomena are essenceless.

original: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin snang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin snang bar bya'o //
translated: I will illuminate the nature of the world.

original: chos kyi 'thad pa rab tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'thad pa rab tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: I will proclaim the logic of the Dharma.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
translated: I will teach the nature of wisdom.

original: go cha'i dam pa bgos pa yongs su mi spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: go cha'i dam pa bgos pa yongs su mi spang bar bya'o //
translated: I will not abandon the donning of the supreme armor.

original: skal ba mnyam par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: skal ba mnyam par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par bya'o //
translated: I will abide with those who engage in the same conduct.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa la sems lhod pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa la sems lhod pa med par bya'o //
translated: One should be without mental laxity in the recollection of all the buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par bya'o //
translated: One should be without conceptualization in regard to all the tathāgatas.

original: chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa med pa la bdag rab tu sbyar @318b bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa med pa la bdag rab tu sbyar @318b bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply oneself to the undivided dharmadhātu.

original: sems sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sems sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the mind to be like an illusion.

original: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad rmi lam lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad rmi lam lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand all the mundane existences to be like a dream.

original: smon lam dang sangs rgyas blta bar bya ba thams cad mig yor lta bur shes par bya'o //
analyzed: smon lam dang sangs rgyas blta bar bya ba thams cad mig yor lta bur shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know all the aspirations and the vision of the buddhas to be like a mirage.

original: slob pa med pa'i chos 'byams klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes par bya'o //
analyzed: slob pa med pa'i chos 'byams klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know all the infinite phenomena that are not learned to be like a magical creation.

original: tshig gi lam thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: tshig gi lam thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand all the paths of speech to be like an echo.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should realize all phenomena to be like an illusion.

original: shi 'pho dang / skye ba thams cad 'khrul 'khor lta bur shes par bya'o //
analyzed: shi 'pho dang / skye ba thams cad 'khrul 'khor lta bur shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand all deaths and rebirths to be like a magical creation.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba thams cad lus med par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba thams cad lus med par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: I will understand that all beings in the buddha-fields are formless.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos dri bas yongs su skyo ba med par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos dri bas yongs su skyo ba med par bya'o //
translated: I will never tire of asking all the Tathagatas about the qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad 'jig par bstan pa'i sa dang / gdams ngag dang / man ngag tu bya ba la btang snyoms med par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad 'jig par bstan pa'i sa dang / gdams ngag dang / man ngag tu bya ba la btang snyoms med par bya'o //
translated: I will not be indifferent to the teaching of the destruction of all worldly things, and to the instructions and counsel.🔽I will bring to maturity those beings who are ready to be disciplined.’

original: gdul bar bya ba dus la bab pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de /
analyzed: gdul bar bya ba dus la bab pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva🔽who is intent on the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra,🔽who is accomplishing the mandala of the bodhisattva conduct,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la nan tan du byed pa dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub pa dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba la rab tu brtson pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la nan tan du byed pa dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub pa dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba la rab tu brtson pa dang /
translated: who is striving for the bodhisattva emergence,

original: de ltar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / de ltar chos nyid 'khrugs pa med @319a *//
analyzed: de ltar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / de ltar chos nyid 'khrugs pa med @319a *//
translated: In this way, they discern the undifferentiated nature of phenomena.🔽In this way, they purify the infinite buddha realms.🔽In this way, they aspire to all the thus-gone ones.

original: par rnam par 'byed pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mos par byed pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi stobs 'byams klas pa khong du chud par byed pa dang /
analyzed: par rnam par 'byed pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mos par byed pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi stobs 'byams klas pa khong du chud par byed pa dang /
translated: In this way, they comprehend the infinite power of the buddhas.🔽In this way, they discern with an unattached mind.

original: de ltar chags pa med pa'i sems kyis rab tu 'byed pa dang / phyogs mtshams med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu skal ba mnyam par rnam par dgod pa la 'gro ba rnams rab tu dgod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar chags pa med pa'i sems kyis rab tu 'byed pa dang / phyogs mtshams med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu skal ba mnyam par rnam par dgod pa la 'gro ba rnams rab tu dgod pa'i tshe /
translated: When they establish beings in the various realms of the same fortune in the infinite, inexpressible, and even further inexpressible directions,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcas pa /
translated: they establish them in the buddha realms together with the thus-gone ones.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad ma lus pa de dag gi phyogs gcig gi de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan tha dad pa dang / mtshan gcig pa thams cad dang / phyogs gcig nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs 'byams klas pa'i rgyud thams cad nas kyang de bzhin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad ma lus pa de dag gi phyogs gcig gi de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan tha dad pa dang / mtshan gcig pa thams cad dang / phyogs gcig nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs 'byams klas pa'i rgyud thams cad nas kyang de bzhin te /
translated: In all of those worlds, in each of their directions, there are tathāgatas with different names and with the same name.🔽Just as it is in one direction, it is the same in all the infinite directions of the ten directions.🔽Just as it is in one infinite direction, it is the same in all the infinite directions of the worlds, as numerous as the atoms in an anabhilāpyānabhilāpya of buddha realms.

original: phyogs 'byams klas pa'i rgyud gcig nas ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad nas kyang de bzhin te /🔽phyogs re re nas kyang mtshan re re'i sgos /
analyzed: phyogs 'byams klas pa'i rgyud gcig nas ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad nas kyang de bzhin te /🔽phyogs re re nas kyang mtshan re re'i sgos /
translated: In each direction, there are tathāgatas with different names and with the same name.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin @319b tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin @319b tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan to //
translated: the tathāgatas, as numerous as the atoms in an ineffably ineffable number of buddhafields, revealed their faces to him.

original: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i phyogs bcu ma lus par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i phyogs bcu ma lus par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas kyang /
translated: In the same way, in all the buddhafields of the ten directions, throughout the entire realm of phenomena,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis zhal mngon par bstan te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis zhal mngon par bstan te /
translated: all the tathāgatas revealed their faces to him.🔽The bodhisattva was established in the domain of the samādhi of great wisdom and the sameness of meditative absorption.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ye shes chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la yang dag par gnas pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rmongs pa med cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ye shes chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la yang dag par gnas pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rmongs pa med cing /
translated: In this way, the tathāgatas caused him to attain the understanding of the tathāgatas,

original: chos thams cad la rab tu gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i blo gros nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: chos thams cad la rab tu gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i blo gros nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: so that he would be able to penetrate all phenomena.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol zhing chos rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi don khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir blo gros nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol zhing chos rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi don khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir blo gros nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: He establishes the mind in order to penetrate omniscience and to comprehend the meaning of all the different teachings.

original: chags pa med pa la rtogs par gzhog pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par bya ba'i phyir /🔽rig pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: chags pa med pa la rtogs par gzhog pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par bya ba'i phyir / rig pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: He establishes knowledge in order to grasp all the qualities of the Buddha by being established in nonattachment.

original: ye shes 'byams klas pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / blo gros rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ye shes 'byams klas pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / blo gros rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: He establishes wisdom in order to comprehend the infinite expanse of knowledge and to establish the enlightenment of the Buddha in all the infinite realms of the Dharma-Sphere, which is the purified sphere of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi snang ba dang / 'od thams cad kyis mun pa med pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir shes rab nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi snang ba dang / 'od thams cad kyis mun pa med pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir shes rab nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: He establishes insight in order to make the bodhisattva turn away from the darkness of ignorance by means of all the light and radiance of the Dharma.

original: byang @320a *// chub sems dpa' de thabs mkhas pa 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pas sems can 'dul ba la bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir /🔽ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: byang @320a *// chub sems dpa' de thabs mkhas pa 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pas sems can 'dul ba la bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir / ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: The bodhisattva is endowed with the wisdom that is the highest of all worlds, and the Buddha bestows on him the wisdom that is unobstructed in order to discipline beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa brjod pa la zad mi shes pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de chos kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa brjod pa la zad mi shes pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: The bodhisattva has generated the inexhaustible, distinct, perfect knowledges of the endless varieties of Dharma, and the Buddha bestows on him the eloquence that is unobstructed in order to teach the Dharma to beings.🔽The bodhisattva has the body that is beyond all worlds, and the Buddha bestows on him the magical power that is unobstructed in order to manifest in all worlds.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba thams cad du lus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyud dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par ston par bya ba'i phyir /🔽sprul pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba thams cad du lus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyud dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par ston par bya ba'i phyir /🔽sprul pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: The bodhisattva has the body that is beyond all worlds, and the Buddha bestows on him the magical power that is unobstructed in order to manifest in all worlds.🔽The bodhisattva has the body that is beyond all worlds, and the Buddha bestows on him the magical power that is unobstructed in order to manifest in all worlds.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de sems can sna tshogs thams cad la dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs dang skad sna tshogs ston par bya ba'i phyir /🔽lce yangs pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de sems can sna tshogs thams cad la dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs dang skad sna tshogs ston par bya ba'i phyir / lce yangs pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: The bodhisattva manifests a vast tongue in order to demonstrate to all the various kinds of beings the various kinds of sounds and voices endowed with the branches of melodious enunciation.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de mthong ma thag tu ston pa dang / thos par byed pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la rmongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir /🔽rmongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de mthong ma thag tu ston pa dang / thos par byed pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la rmongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir / rmongs pa med par nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: The bodhisattva manifests non-delusion in order to be undeluded in the ripening of all beings through the mere sight of or hearing of himself.

original: des byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin /🔽yongs su grub nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo yongs su rdzogs par bya bas /
analyzed: des byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin / yongs su grub nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo yongs su rdzogs par bya bas /
translated: By that, the bodhisattva is perfected in the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la 'jug go /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la 'jug go /
translated: Having been perfected, he enters the lineage of the tathagatas by perfecting the door of omniscience.

original: 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: He purifies the door of manifestation.

original: chags pa med @320b pa'i sgos yongs su 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: chags pa med @320b pa'i sgos yongs su 'byung bar byed do //
translated: He causes the arising of the Dharma through the door of nonattachment.

original: sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su rtsom zhing byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su rtsom zhing byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: He causes the arising of the door of the appearance of all beings.

original: chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo yang dag par ston to //
translated: He reveals the door of the manifestation of all phenomena.

original: cho 'phrul gyi sgo chos med pas sems can 'dul ba la rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: cho 'phrul gyi sgo chos med pas sems can 'dul ba la rab tu 'jug go /
translated: He engages in the training of beings through the door of the miracle of the nonexistence of phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam pa la rab tu mkhas par sbyong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam pa la rab tu mkhas par sbyong ngo //
translated: He trains in the skill of the aspects of the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yang dag par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yang dag par 'byung ngo //
translated: He arises through the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra in the display of the power of the supremacy of all buddhas.

original: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir /
translated: For the sake of training all beings until the end of time,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par phye ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i mthar thug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du rlob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par phye ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i mthar thug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du rlob bo //
translated: He turns the wheel of the Dharma that analyzes all the qualities of the Buddha. He is empowered by the empowerment of the ultimate training of all beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni smon lam gyi khyad par de lta bu dang ldan pas yongs su grub bam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni smon lam gyi khyad par de lta bu dang ldan pas yongs su grub bam /
translated: Because the bodhisattva is endowed with such special aspirations.

original: ma grub na 'jig rten thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ma grub na 'jig rten thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Whether he is fully accomplished or not, he becomes the master of all worlds.

original: chos kyi nyi ma 'jig rten du shar ba yin /
analyzed: chos kyi nyi ma 'jig rten du shar ba yin /
translated: The sun of the Dharma rises in the world.

original: ye shes kyi zla ba 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar byung ba yin /🔽ye shes dam pa'i ri rab mi g-yo pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa yin /
analyzed: ye shes kyi zla ba 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar byung ba yin / ye shes dam pa'i ri rab mi g-yo pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa yin /
translated: The moon of wisdom appears in all worlds.🔽The immovable Sumeru of sublime wisdom rises above all worlds.

original: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par gnas pa yin /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par gnas pa yin /
translated: The immeasurable ocean of wisdom abides perfectly in all worlds.

original: bsgrub pa rgyun mi 'chad pas 'jig rten thams cad du chos kyi nan tan byed pa yin /
analyzed: bsgrub pa rgyun mi 'chad pas 'jig rten thams cad du chos kyi nan tan byed pa yin /
translated: They are dedicated to the practice of the Dharma in all worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams sa mtshams med pa thams cad du rab tu snang ba yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams sa mtshams med pa thams cad du rab tu snang ba yin /
translated: They illuminate all the boundless world systems.

original: rnam par dag pa yangs shing mtha' yas pa 'gro ba thams cad brjod pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa yangs shing mtha' yas pa 'gro ba thams cad brjod pa yin /
translated: They proclaim the vast and boundless purity to all beings.

original: sems can gyi khams @321a *//
analyzed: sems can gyi khams @321a *//
translated: They establish the boundless realms of sentient beings

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi rgyud dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po la rab tu brtson par gzhog pa yin /
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi rgyud dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po la rab tu brtson par gzhog pa yin /
translated: in the great prayers that are connected with the roots of virtue, the continuum of merit, and omniscience.

original: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i brtson 'grus yangs pa rgya chen po'i smon lam chen po la rab tu gzhog pa yin /
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i brtson 'grus yangs pa rgya chen po'i smon lam chen po la rab tu gzhog pa yin /
translated: They establish them in the great prayers of the vast and extensive diligence of the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: spyod pa chen po dang ting nge 'dzin yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la sems can gyi khams yang dag par gzhog cing rab tu sbyor ro //
analyzed: spyod pa chen po dang ting nge 'dzin yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la sems can gyi khams yang dag par gzhog cing rab tu sbyor ro //
translated: They establish and connect the realms of sentient beings with the inexpressibly inexpressible emanations of the great conduct and the vast samādhi.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ngang tshul can /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ngang tshul can /
translated: “Bodhisattvas have such a nature.

original: de lta bu'i ye shes can /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes can /
translated: They have such wisdom.

original: de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur pa /
translated: They have attained such Dharma.

original: de lta bu'i chos kyi snang bar gyur pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos kyi snang bar gyur pa /
translated: They are such a light of Dharma.

original: de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa /
translated: They abide by such Dharma.

original: chos de lta bu mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: chos de lta bu mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: They have seen such Dharma.

original: mngon par shes pa de lta bu'i yid dang ldan pa /🔽cho 'phrul dam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa de lta bu'i yid dang ldan pa / cho 'phrul dam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa /
translated: They have such a mind of higher knowledge.🔽They have such a sublime miracle.

original: cho 'phrul mchog tu bya ba /
analyzed: cho 'phrul mchog tu bya ba /
translated: They have such a supreme miracle.

original: phul du byung ba de lta bus yang dag par grub pa /
analyzed: phul du byung ba de lta bus yang dag par grub pa /
translated: They have such a perfect accomplishment.

original: rtag tu brtson pa'i snying rje chen pos mngon par 'phags pa /
analyzed: rtag tu brtson pa'i snying rje chen pos mngon par 'phags pa /
translated: They are exalted by such great compassion that is always diligent.

original: chos kyi don bzang po la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson pa /
analyzed: chos kyi don bzang po la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson pa /
translated: They are always diligent in the good meaning of the Dharma.

original: bde ba'i lam yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: bde ba'i lam yang dag par ston pa /
translated: They show the path of happiness.

original: bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes yangs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan du gyur pa /
analyzed: bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes yangs pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan du gyur pa /
translated: They are a banner of the light rays of great merit and vast wisdom.

original: rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu thob pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu thob pa /
translated: They have attained such inconceivable liberation.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul la don yod par rjes su song ba /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul la don yod par rjes su song ba /
translated: It is the domain of omniscience, which is meaningful in every way.🔽

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa /
translated: They had attained the perfection of the Buddha’s liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba bsam @321b gyis mi khyab pa rab tu bsgoms pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba bsam @321b gyis mi khyab pa rab tu bsgoms pa /
translated: They had meditated on the inconceivable, subtle ways of liberation.
