original: chos thams cad tshad med pa ma yin par yang rab tu shes so //🔽chos thams cad 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad tshad med pa ma yin par yang rab tu shes so // chos thams cad 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not immeasurable.🔽They know that all phenomena are not worldly.

original: chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not beyond the world.

original: chos thams cad rgyu las byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad rgyu las byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not produced from causes.

original: chos thams cad rgyu las ma byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //🔽chos thams cad kha dog nges pa med par yang rab tu shes so //🔽chos thams cad kha dog nges pa med pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad rgyu las ma byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so // chos thams cad kha dog nges pa med par yang rab tu shes so // chos thams cad kha dog nges pa med pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not unproduced from causes.🔽They know that all phenomena are not of a certain color.🔽They know that all phenomena are not not of a certain color.

original: chos thams cad kha dog yongs su grub pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad kha dog yongs su grub pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not of a certain form.

original: chos thams cad kha dog yongs su ma grub pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //🔽chos thams cad byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad kha dog yongs su ma grub pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so // chos thams cad byung ba'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not unestablished as colors.🔽They know that all phenomena are not arisen.

original: chos thams cad byung ba ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab @346a *//🔽tu shes so //🔽chos thams cad rnam par brtags pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad byung ba ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab @346a *// tu shes so // chos thams cad rnam par brtags pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not non-arisen.🔽They know that all phenomena are not conceptualized.

original: chos thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //🔽chos thams cad tshul yang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so // chos thams cad tshul yang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not non-conceptualized.🔽They know that all phenomena are not methods.

original: chos thams cad tshul ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad tshul ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that all phenomena are not non-methods.

original: de ni spyod pa la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: de ni spyod pa la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to conduct.

original: don dam pa la gnas pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa la gnas pa med do //
translated: They do not abide in the ultimate.

original: chos la rab tu rtog pa med do //
analyzed: chos la rab tu rtog pa med do //
translated: They do not conceptualize phenomena.

original: yi ge yongs su sgrub pa med do //
analyzed: yi ge yongs su sgrub pa med do //
translated: They do not establish syllables.

original: zhi ba'i rjes su shin tu 'brang ngo //
analyzed: zhi ba'i rjes su shin tu 'brang ngo //
translated: They follow peace.

original: smon lam yongs su mi gtong ngo //
analyzed: smon lam yongs su mi gtong ngo //
translated: They do not abandon their aspirations.

original: don gyi tshul la rnam par lta'o //
analyzed: don gyi tshul la rnam par lta'o //
translated: I see the way of the meaning.

original: chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug go /🔽chos kyi sprin kun nas slong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug go / chos kyi sprin kun nas slong ngo //
translated: I enter the way of the Dharma.🔽I arouse the cloud of Dharma.

original: chos yongs su 'bab pa'i yi ge'i char mngon par 'phebs  so //
analyzed: chos yongs su 'bab pa'i yi ge'i char mngon par 'phebs  so //
translated: I send down the rain of the syllables of the Dharma.

original: tshul brjod du med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: tshul brjod du med pa la 'jug go /
translated: I enter the inexpressible way.

original: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zad mi shes pa don gyi tshul rab tu brjod cing /
analyzed: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zad mi shes pa don gyi tshul rab tu brjod cing /
translated: I have inexhaustible knowledge of the different kinds of expression, and I teach the way of the Dharma by expressing the way of the meaning.

original: chos kyi tshul mngon par ston pas chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad spobs pas thabs mkhas pa'i tshul brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul mngon par ston pas chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad spobs pas thabs mkhas pa'i tshul brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la rab tu 'jug go /
translated: I have skill in the etymologies of all Dharmas, and I enter the inexpressible and the further inexpressible by means of the eloquence of all Dharmas.

original: byams pa chen po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: byams pa chen po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: I have the purity of great love.

original: snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa yi ga med pa'i yul dang ldan pa yi ges mngon par bsgrubs pa'i don la brtson zhing /
analyzed: snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa yi ga med pa'i yul dang ldan pa yi ges mngon par bsgrubs pa'i don la brtson zhing /
translated: I have attained great compassion. I am dedicated to the meaning that is accomplished by means of syllables, which is the domain of the inexpressible.

original: 'gal ba med pa rang bzhin gyis @346b chos la brtson pa chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par byung par ston pas gos pa med pa /
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa rang bzhin gyis @346b chos la brtson pa chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par byung par ston pas gos pa med pa /

original: brjod pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brjod pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He has the eloquence that accords with all expressions.

original: de chos thams cad zad mi shes pa'i spobs pas ston to //
analyzed: de chos thams cad zad mi shes pa'i spobs pas ston to //
translated: He teaches all phenomena with inexhaustible eloquence.

original: brjod do // rnam par 'god do //
analyzed: brjod do // rnam par 'god do //
translated: He explains, establishes,

original: yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par ston to //
translated: and reveals them.

original: 'grel to // rnam par 'byed do //
analyzed: 'grel to // rnam par 'byed do //
translated: He elucidates, analyzes,

original: 'byin to // khong du chud par byed do //🔽rab tu ston to //
analyzed: 'byin to // khong du chud par byed do // rab tu ston to //
translated: and brings them forth.🔽He causes them to be understood,🔽reveals them,

original: rtogs par byed do //🔽rab tu sgrub bo //🔽rnam par sbyong ngo //🔽the tshom sel to //
analyzed: rtogs par byed do // rab tu sgrub bo // rnam par sbyong ngo // the tshom sel to //
translated: and makes them manifest.🔽He purifies,🔽removes doubts,

original: dogs pa gcod do //
analyzed: dogs pa gcod do //
translated: and cuts through hesitations.

original: de kho na ston to //
analyzed: de kho na ston to //
translated: He teaches reality,

original: rang bzhin brjod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin brjod do //
translated: describes its nature,🔽and benefits beings.

original: 'gro ba la phan 'dogs so; ;chos nyid las mi nyams so //
analyzed: 'gro ba la phan 'dogs so; ;chos nyid las mi nyams so //
translated: He does not deviate from the nature of phenomena,

original: mi gnyis pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la 'jug go /
translated: engages in nonduality,

original: chags pa med pa'i sgo ston to //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i sgo ston to //
translated: and reveals the gateway to nonattachment.

original: dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas rab tu 'joms pa'i sgras sgra'i char yang bsam pa ji lta ba'i dus las yol bar mi byed par mngon par 'bebs so //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas rab tu 'joms pa'i sgras sgra'i char yang bsam pa ji lta ba'i dus las yol bar mi byed par mngon par 'bebs so //
translated: By perfecting all the aspects of melody, he emits a voice that is completely victorious, a voice that does not pass beyond the time that is appropriate for the rain of speech.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O Children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa ste dgu pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa ste dgu pa'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattvas’ superknowledge of the knowledge of all phenomena, the ninth.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O Children of the Victorious Ones,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems skad cig re re zhing chos thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems skad cig re re zhing chos thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang /
translated: furthermore, bodhisattva great beings, in each instant of mind, enter the meditative absorption of the cessation of all phenomena,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyud mi gcod do //🔽byang chub sems dpa'i las @347a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyud mi gcod do // byang chub sems dpa'i las @347a *//
translated: yet they do not interrupt the continuum of the bodhisattva path.

original: kyang thogs par mi byed do //
analyzed: kyang thogs par mi byed do //
translated: They do not obstruct the bodhisattva activities.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po las kyang rnam par mi 'dra'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po las kyang rnam par mi 'dra'o //
translated: They do not deviate from the bodhisattvas’ great love.

original: snying rje chen po las kyang phyir mi ldog go /
analyzed: snying rje chen po las kyang phyir mi ldog go /
translated: They do not turn back from great compassion.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang rgyun mi gcod do //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang rgyun mi gcod do //
translated: They do not interrupt the perfections.

original: zhing thams cad rab tu dbye zhing mkhas par bya bas kyang skyo bar mi byed do //
analyzed: zhing thams cad rab tu dbye zhing mkhas par bya bas kyang skyo bar mi byed do //
translated: They do not become discouraged by the need to understand the divisions of all the realms.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i smon lam yang rgyun mi gcod do //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i smon lam yang rgyun mi gcod do //
translated: They do not interrupt the aspiration to liberate all beings.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo yang thogs par mi byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo yang thogs par mi byed do //
translated: They do not interrupt the turning of the wheel of Dharma.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba yang ring du mi spong ngo //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba yang ring du mi spong ngo //
translated: They do not delay in bringing beings to maturity and liberation.

original: sangs rgyas mchod cing rim gro bya ba'ang rgyun mi gcod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchod cing rim gro bya ba'ang rgyun mi gcod do //
translated: They do not interrupt the worship and service of the buddhas.

original: chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo las kyang phyir mi ldog go /
analyzed: chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo las kyang phyir mi ldog go /
translated: They do not turn back from the gateway of mastery over all phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i skal pa med par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i skal pa med par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not lack the good fortune to see the buddhas.

original: chos thams cad yongs su dri ba las kyang phyir mi ldog go /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su dri ba las kyang phyir mi ldog go /
translated: They do not turn back from asking questions about all phenomena.

original: mnyam pa nyid dang bstod pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid dang bstod pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know praise to be sameness.

original: bsgribs pa med pa yang mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa yang mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: they manifest without obscuration;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la khyad par gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la khyad par gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the aspiration for the distinctive qualities of buddhahood;

original: zhing thams cad kyi gzhi dang dbyings tha dad pa'i rjes su'ang rab tu 'jug ste; sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang thob pa yin /
analyzed: zhing thams cad kyi gzhi dang dbyings tha dad pa'i rjes su'ang rab tu 'jug ste; sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang thob pa yin /
translated: they enter into the different bases and realms of all worlds; they attain the perfection of all the buddha lineages;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang / de dag tu chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur bslab @347b pa'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang / de dag tu chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur bslab @347b pa'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin /
translated: they are well trained in the training of all phenomena as being like magical illusions in all the world systems of the realms of the ten directions;

original: chos thams cad mtshan ma med par zhugs pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad mtshan ma med par zhugs pas /
translated: they are skilled in the way of all phenomena being without signs;

original: chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: they are skilled in the way of the dependent origination of all phenomena;

original: chos thams cad lus med pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul dang / spyod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa dang yang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad lus med pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul dang / spyod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa dang yang ldan pa yin /
translated: they have realized the way of the absence of a body of all phenomena, the way of the nature of all phenomena, and the way of conduct;

original: chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba la mi gnas pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba la mi gnas pa yin /
translated: They do not dwell in following any phenomena.

original: chos kyi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs shing bsam pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba'ang rab tu rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs shing bsam pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba'ang rab tu rtogs pa yin /
translated: They realize all the ways of the Dharma and they realize the thoughts and faculties of others.

original: de 'dod na bskal pa dang / bskal pa gcig dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya dang /
analyzed: de 'dod na bskal pa dang / bskal pa gcig dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya dang /
translated: If they wish, they can remember one eon, a hundred eons, a thousand eons, a hundred thousand eons, a million eons, a billion eons, a trillion eons, a quintillion eons,

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong dang / bskal pa tshad med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong dang / bskal pa tshad med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /
translated: countless eons, immeasurable eons, limitless eons, inconceivable eons, unequaled eons, incomparable eons, and infinite eons.

original: mu med pa dang / sa mtshams med pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par chos thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs kyang de'i lus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro //🔽nyam chung par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mu med pa dang / sa mtshams med pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par chos thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs kyang de'i lus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro // nyam chung par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He enters into the concentration of the cessation of all phenomena, and his body does not perish.🔽He does not become weak.

original: skal ba zhan par mi 'gyur @348a *//🔽ro; ;chud mi za'o //
analyzed: skal ba zhan par mi 'gyur @348a *// ro; ;chud mi za'o //
translated: He does not become unfortunate.🔽He does not waste away.

original: rnam par chud mi za'o //
analyzed: rnam par chud mi za'o //
translated: He does not waste away completely.

original: zhum par mi 'gyur ro //🔽rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhum par mi 'gyur ro // rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not become depressed.🔽He does not become completely depressed.

original: zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not become exhausted.

original: dngos po yod pa dang med par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos po yod pa dang med par mi 'gyur te /
translated: He does not become a non-existent thing.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba'ang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He accomplishes the activities of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang brjod do //🔽sems can gyi dus kyang yongs su mi spong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang brjod do // sems can gyi dus kyang yongs su mi spong ngo //
translated: He proclaims the true nature of a bodhisattva.🔽He does not abandon the time of sentient beings.

original: sems can 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa yang thogs par mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa yang thogs par mi byed do //
translated: He does not delay when the time has come to train sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyang rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyang rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
translated: and the qualities of buddhahood increase.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The equality of the bodhisattvas is perfected.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don kyang yongs su mi gtong ngo //
translated: The benefit of all beings is not abandoned.

original: sprul pa'i rgyud kyang rgyun mi gcod do //
analyzed: sprul pa'i rgyud kyang rgyun mi gcod do //
translated: The stream of emanations is not cut off.

original: mi g-yar lta bu'i chos kyi tshul las kyang ldog par mi byed do //
analyzed: mi g-yar lta bu'i chos kyi tshul las kyang ldog par mi byed do //
translated: The way of the Dharma, which is like a mirage, is not reversed.

original: bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sa las kyang mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sa las kyang mi g-yo'o //
translated: The levels of concentration and absorption are not shaken.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
